88static const activity_id ACT_FIRSTAID( "ACT_FIRSTAID" );
89static const activity_id ACT_MAKE_ZLAVE( "ACT_MAKE_ZLAVE" );
90static const activity_id ACT_RELOAD( "ACT_RELOAD" );
91static const activity_id ACT_REPAIR_ITEM( "ACT_REPAIR_ITEM" );
92static const activity_id ACT_SPELLCASTING( "ACT_SPELLCASTING" );
93static const activity_id ACT_STUDY_SPELL( "ACT_STUDY_SPELL" );
94static const activity_id ACT_START_FIRE( "ACT_START_FIRE" );

96static const efftype_id effect_accumulated_mutagen( "accumulated_mutagen" );
97static const efftype_id effect_asthma( "asthma" );
98static const efftype_id effect_bandaged( "bandaged" );
99static const efftype_id effect_bite( "bite" );
100static const efftype_id effect_bleed( "bleed" );
101static const efftype_id effect_pet( "pet" );

145static const std::string flag_OVERSIZE( "OVERSIZE" );

147static const std::string flag_VARSIZE( "VARSIZE" );

150class npc;
151
152std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> iuse_transform::clone() const
153{
154 return std::make_unique<iuse_transform>( *this );
155}
156
157void iuse_transform::load( const JsonObject &obj )
158{
159 obj.read( "target", target, true );
160
161 obj.read( "msg", msg_transform );
162 obj.read( "container", container );
163 if( obj.has_member( "target_charges" ) && obj.has_member( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
164 obj.throw_error( "Transform actor specified both fixed and random target charges",
165 "target_charges" );
166 }
167 obj.read( "target_charges", ammo_qty );
168 if( obj.has_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
169 for( const int charge : obj.get_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
170 random_ammo_qty.push_back( charge );
171 }
172 if( random_ammo_qty.size() < 2 ) {
173 obj.throw_error( "You must specify two or more values to choose between", "rand_target_charges" );
174 }
175 }
176 obj.read( "target_ammo", ammo_type );
177
178 obj.read( "countdown", countdown );
179
180 if( !ammo_type.is_empty() && !container.is_empty() ) {
181 obj.throw_error( "Transform actor specified both ammo type and container type", "target_ammo" );
182 }
183
184 obj.read( "active", active );
185
186 obj.read( "moves", moves );
187 if( moves < 0 ) {
188 obj.throw_error( "transform actor specified negative moves", "moves" );
189 }
190
191 obj.read( "need_fire", need_fire );
192 need_fire = std::max( need_fire, 0 );
193 if( !obj.read( "need_charges_msg", need_charges_msg ) ) {
194 need_charges_msg = to_translation( "The %s is empty!" );
195 }
196
197 obj.read( "need_charges", need_charges );
198 need_charges = std::max( need_charges, 0 );
199 if( !obj.read( "need_fire_msg", need_fire_msg ) ) {
200 need_fire_msg = to_translation( "You need a source of fire!" );
201 }
202
203 obj.read( "need_worn", need_worn );
204 obj.read( "need_wielding", need_wielding );
205
206 obj.read( "qualities_needed", qualities_needed );
207
208 obj.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
209}
210
211int iuse_transform::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
212{
213 if( t ) {
214 return 0; // invoked from active item processing, do nothing.
215 }
216
217 const bool possess = p.has_item( it ) ||
218 ( it.has_flag( "ALLOWS_REMOTE_USE" ) && square_dist( p.pos(), pos ) == 1 );
219
220 if( possess && need_worn && !p.is_worn( it ) ) {
221 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
222 return 0;
223 }
224 if( possess && need_wielding && !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
225 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
226 return 0;
227 }
228 if( need_charges ) {
229 if( it.has_flag( flag_POWERARMOR_MOD ) && p.can_interface_armor() ) {
230 if( !p.has_power() ) {
231 if( possess ) {
232 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_charges_msg, it.tname() );
233 }
234 return 0;
235 }
236 } else if( it.units_remaining( p ) < need_charges ) {
237 if( possess ) {
238 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_charges_msg, it.tname() );
239 }
240 return 0;
241 }
242 }
243
244
245 if( need_fire && possess ) {
246 if( !p.use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, need_fire ) ) {
247 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_fire_msg, it.tname() );
248 return 0;
249 }
250 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
251 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater" ) );
252 return 0;
253 }
254 }
255
256 if( possess && !msg_transform.empty() ) {
257 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, msg_transform, it.tname() );
258 }
259
260 if( possess ) {
261 p.moves -= moves;
262 }
263
264 item obj_copy( it );
265 item *obj;
266 // defined here to allow making a new item assigned to the pointer
267 item obj_it;
268 if( container.is_empty() ) {
269 obj = &it.convert( target );
270 if( ammo_qty >= 0 || !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
271 int qty;
272 if( !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
273 const auto index = rng( 1, random_ammo_qty.size() - 1 );
274 qty = rng( random_ammo_qty[index - 1], random_ammo_qty[index] );
275 } else {
276 qty = ammo_qty;
277 }
278 if( !ammo_type.is_empty() ) {
279 obj->ammo_set( ammo_type, qty );
280 } else if( !obj->ammo_current().is_null() ) {
281 obj->ammo_set( obj->ammo_current(), qty );
282 } else {
283 obj->set_countdown( qty );
284 }
285 }
286 } else {
287 it.convert( container );
288 obj_it = item( target, calendar::turn, std::max( ammo_qty, 1 ) );
289 obj = &obj_it;
290 it.put_in( *obj );
291 }
292 if( p.is_worn( *obj ) ) {
293 p.reset_encumbrance();
294 // This is most likely wrong: it doubles temperature shift for the turn!
295 p.update_bodytemp( get_map(), get_weather() );
296 p.on_worn_item_transform( obj_copy, *obj );
297 }
298 obj->item_counter = countdown > 0 ? countdown : obj->type->countdown_interval;
299 obj->active = active || obj->item_counter;
300
301 return 0;
302}
303
304ret_val<bool> iuse_transform::can_use( const Character &p, const item &, bool,
305 const tripoint & ) const
306{
307 if( qualities_needed.empty() ) {
308 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
309 }
310
311 std::map<quality_id, int> unmet_reqs;
312 inventory inv;
313 inv.form_from_map( p.pos(), 1, &p, true, true );
314 for( const auto &quality : qualities_needed ) {
315 if( !p.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) &&
316 !inv.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) ) {
317 unmet_reqs.insert( quality );
318 }
319 }
320 if( unmet_reqs.empty() ) {
321 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
322 }
323 std::string unmet_reqs_string = enumerate_as_string( unmet_reqs.begin(), unmet_reqs.end(),
324 [&]( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &unmet_req ) {
325 return string_format( "%s %d", unmet_req.first.obj().name, unmet_req.second );
326 } );
327 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( vgettext( "You need a tool with %s.", "You need tools with %s.",
328 unmet_reqs.size() ), unmet_reqs_string );
329}
330
331std::string iuse_transform::get_name() const
332{
333 if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
334 return menu_text.translated();
335 }
336 return iuse_actor::get_name();
337}
338
339void iuse_transform::finalize( const itype_id & )
340{
341 if( !target.is_valid() ) {
342 debugmsg( "Invalid transform target: %s", target.c_str() );
343 }
344
345 if( !container.is_empty() ) {
346 if( !container.is_valid() ) {
347 debugmsg( "Invalid transform container: %s", container.c_str() );
348 }
349
350 item dummy( target );
351 if( ammo_qty > 1 && !dummy.count_by_charges() ) {
352 debugmsg( "Transform target with container must be an item with charges, got non-charged: %s",
353 target.c_str() );
354 }
355 }
356}
357
358void iuse_transform::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
359{
360 item dummy( target, calendar::turn, std::max( ammo_qty, 1 ) );
361 if( it.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
362 dummy.set_flag( "FIT" );
363 }
364 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format( _( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: %s" ),
365 dummy.tname() ) );
366 if( countdown > 0 ) {
367 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Countdown: " ), countdown );
368 }
369
370 const auto *explosion_use = dummy.get_use( "explosion" );
371 if( explosion_use != nullptr ) {
372 explosion_use->get_actor_ptr()->info( it, dump );
373 }
374}
375
376std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> unpack_actor::clone() const
377{
378 return std::make_unique<unpack_actor>( *this );
379}
380
381void unpack_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
382{
383 obj.read( "group", unpack_group );
384 obj.read( "items_fit", items_fit );
385 assign( obj, "filthy_volume_threshold", filthy_vol_threshold );
386}
387
388int unpack_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
389{
390 std::vector<item> items = item_group::items_from( unpack_group, calendar::turn );
391 item last_armor;
392
393 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You unpack the %s." ), it.tname() );
394
395 map &here = get_map();
396 for( item &content : items ) {
397 if( content.is_armor() ) {
398 if( items_fit ) {
399 content.set_flag( "FIT" );
400 } else if( content.typeId() == last_armor.typeId() ) {
401 if( last_armor.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
402 content.set_flag( "FIT" );
403 } else if( !last_armor.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
404 content.unset_flag( "FIT" );
405 }
406 }
407 last_armor = content;
408 }
409
410 if( content.get_storage() >= filthy_vol_threshold && it.has_flag( "FILTHY" ) ) {
411 content.set_flag( "FILTHY" );
412 }
413
414 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), content );
415 }
416
417 p.i_rem( &it );
418
419 return 0;
420}
421
422void unpack_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
423{
424 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
425 _( "This item could be unpacked to receive something." ) );
426}
427
428std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> countdown_actor::clone() const
429{
430 return std::make_unique<countdown_actor>( *this );
431}
432
433void countdown_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
434{
435 obj.read( "name", name );
436 obj.read( "interval", interval );
437 obj.read( "message", message );
438}
439
440int countdown_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
441{
442 if( t ) {
443 return 0;
444 }
445
446 if( it.active ) {
447 return 0;
448 }
449
450 if( p.sees( pos ) && !message.empty() ) {
451 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( message ), it.tname() );
452 }
453
454 it.item_counter = interval > 0 ? interval : it.type->countdown_interval;
455 it.active = true;
456 return 0;
457}
458
459ret_val<bool> countdown_actor::can_use( const Character &, const item &it, bool,
460 const tripoint & ) const
461{
462 if( it.active ) {
463 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "It's already been triggered." ) );
464 }
465
466 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
467}
468
469std::string countdown_actor::get_name() const
470{
471 if( !name.empty() ) {
472 return name;
473 }
474 return iuse_actor::get_name();
475}
476
477void countdown_actor::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
478{
479 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Countdown: " ),
480 interval > 0 ? interval : it.type->countdown_interval );
481 const auto countdown_actor = it.type->countdown_action.get_actor_ptr();
482 if( countdown_actor != nullptr ) {
483 countdown_actor->info( it, dump );
484 }
485}
486
487std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> explosion_iuse::clone() const
488{
489 return std::make_unique<explosion_iuse>( *this );
490}
491
492// For an explosion (which releases some kind of gas), this function
493// calculates the points around that explosion where to create those
494// gas fields.
495// Those points must have a clear line of sight and a clear path to
496// the center of the explosion.
497// They must also be passable.
498static std::vector<tripoint> points_for_gas_cloud( const tripoint &center, int radius )
499{
500 map &here = get_map();
501 std::vector<tripoint> result;
502 for( const auto &p : closest_points_first( center, radius ) ) {
503 if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
504 continue;
505 }
506 if( p != center ) {
507 if( !here.clear_path( center, p, radius, 1, 100 ) ) {
508 // Can not splatter gas from center to that point, something is in the way
509 continue;
510 }
511 }
512 result.push_back( p );
513 }
514 return result;
515}
516
517void explosion_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
518{
519 if( obj.has_object( "explosion" ) ) {
520 auto expl = obj.get_object( "explosion" );
521 explosion = load_explosion_data( expl );
522 }
523
524 obj.read( "draw_explosion_radius", draw_explosion_radius );
525 if( obj.has_member( "draw_explosion_color" ) ) {
526 draw_explosion_color = color_from_string( obj.get_string( "draw_explosion_color" ) );
527 }
528 obj.read( "do_flashbang", do_flashbang );
529 obj.read( "flashbang_player_immune", flashbang_player_immune );
530 obj.read( "fields_radius", fields_radius );
531 if( obj.has_member( "fields_type" ) || fields_radius > 0 ) {
532 fields_type = field_type_id( obj.get_string( "fields_type" ) );
533 }
534 obj.read( "fields_min_intensity", fields_min_intensity );
535 obj.read( "fields_max_intensity", fields_max_intensity );
536 if( fields_max_intensity == 0 ) {
537 fields_max_intensity = fields_type.obj().get_max_intensity();
538 }
539 obj.read( "emp_blast_radius", emp_blast_radius );
540 obj.read( "scrambler_blast_radius", scrambler_blast_radius );
541 obj.read( "sound_volume", sound_volume );
542 obj.read( "sound_msg", sound_msg );
543 obj.read( "no_deactivate_msg", no_deactivate_msg );
544}
545
546int explosion_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
547{
548 if( t ) {
549 if( sound_volume >= 0 ) {
550 sounds::sound( pos, sound_volume, sounds::sound_t::alarm,
551 sound_msg.empty() ? _( "Tick." ) : _( sound_msg ), true, "misc", "bomb_ticking" );
552 }
553 return 0;
554 }
555 if( it.charges > 0 ) {
556 if( p.has_item( it ) ) {
557 if( no_deactivate_msg.empty() ) {
558 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
559 _( "You've already set the %s's timer you might want to get away from it." ), it.tname() );
560 } else {
561 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( no_deactivate_msg ), it.tname() );
562 }
563 }
564 return 0;
565 }
566
567 trigger_explosion( pos );
568 return 1;
569}
570
571void explosion_iuse::trigger_explosion( const tripoint &pos ) const
572{
573 if( explosion ) {
574 explosion_handler::explosion( pos, explosion );
575 }
576
577 if( draw_explosion_radius >= 0 ) {
578 explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, draw_explosion_radius, draw_explosion_color, "explosion" );
579 }
580 if( do_flashbang ) {
581 explosion_handler::flashbang( pos, flashbang_player_immune, "explosion" );
582 }
583 map &here = get_map();
584 if( fields_radius >= 0 && fields_type.id() ) {
585 std::vector<tripoint> gas_sources = points_for_gas_cloud( pos, fields_radius );
586 for( auto &gas_source : gas_sources ) {
587 const int field_intensity = rng( fields_min_intensity, fields_max_intensity );
588 here.add_field( gas_source, fields_type, field_intensity, 1_turns );
589 }
590 }
591 if( scrambler_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
592 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, scrambler_blast_radius ) ) {
593 explosion_handler::scrambler_blast( dest );
594 }
595 }
596 if( emp_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
597 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, emp_blast_radius ) ) {
598 explosion_handler::emp_blast( dest );
599 }
600 }
601}
602
603void explosion_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
604{
605 if( explosion.damage > 0 ) {
606 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Blast damage at epicenter: " ),
607 explosion.damage );
608 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Blast radius: " ), static_cast<int>( explosion.radius ) );
609 }
610 const auto &sd = explosion.fragment;
611 if( sd ) {
612 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Shrapnel damage: " ),
613 static_cast<int>( sd->impact.total_damage() ) );
614 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Shrapnel range: " ), sd->range );
615 }
616
617 // TODO: List other effects, like EMP and clouds
618}
619
620std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> unfold_vehicle_iuse::clone() const
621{
622 return std::make_unique<unfold_vehicle_iuse>( *this );
623}
624
625void unfold_vehicle_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
626{
627 vehicle_id = vproto_id( obj.get_string( "vehicle_name" ) );
628 obj.read( "unfold_msg", unfold_msg );
629 obj.read( "moves", moves );
630 obj.read( "tools_needed", tools_needed );
631}
632
633int unfold_vehicle_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
634{
635 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
636 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
637 return 0;
638 }
639 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
640 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
641 return 0;
642 }
643 for( const auto &tool : tools_needed ) {
644 // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
645 if( !p.has_amount( tool.first, 1 ) ) {
646 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %s to do it!" ),
647 item::nname( tool.first ) );
648 return 0;
649 }
650 }
651
652 vehicle *veh = get_map().add_vehicle( vehicle_id, p.pos(), 0_degrees, 0, 0, false );
653 if( veh == nullptr ) {
654 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no room to unfold the %s." ), it.tname() );
655 return 0;
656 }
657 veh->set_owner( p );
658
659 // Mark the vehicle as foldable.
660 veh->tags.insert( "convertible" );
661 // Store the id of the item the vehicle is made of.
662 veh->tags.insert( std::string( "convertible:" ) + it.typeId().str() );
663 if( !unfold_msg.empty() ) {
664 p.add_msg_if_player( _( unfold_msg ), it.tname() );
665 }
666 p.moves -= moves;
667 // Restore HP of parts if we stashed them previously.
668 if( it.has_var( "folding_bicycle_parts" ) ) {
669 // Brand new, no HP stored
670 return 1;
671 }
672 std::istringstream veh_data;
673 const auto data = it.get_var( "folding_bicycle_parts" );
674 veh_data.str( data );
675 if( !data.empty() && data[0] >= '0' && data[0] <= '9' ) {
676 // starts with a digit -> old format
677 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
678 int tmp;
679 veh_data >> tmp;
680 veh->set_hp( vpr.part(), tmp );
681 }
682 } else {
683 try {
684 JsonIn json( veh_data );
685 // Load parts into a temporary vector to not override
686 // cached values (like precalc, passenger_id, ...)
687 std::vector<vehicle_part> parts;
688 json.read( parts );
689 for( size_t i = 0; i < parts.size() && i < static_cast<size_t>( veh->part_count() ); i++ ) {
690 const vehicle_part &src = parts[i];
691 vehicle_part &dst = veh->part( i );
692 // and now only copy values, that are
693 // expected to be consistent.
694 veh->set_hp( dst, src.hp() );
695 dst.blood = src.blood;
696 // door state/amount of fuel/direction of headlight
697 dst.ammo_set( src.ammo_current(), src.ammo_remaining() );
698 dst.flags = src.flags;
699 }
700 } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
701 debugmsg( "Error restoring vehicle: %s", e.c_str() );
702 }
703 }
704 return 1;
705}
706
707std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> consume_drug_iuse::clone() const
708{
709 return std::make_unique<consume_drug_iuse>( *this );
710}
711
712static effect_data load_effect_data( const JsonObject &e )
713{
714 time_duration time;
715 if( e.has_string( "duration" ) ) {
716 time = read_from_json_string<time_duration>( *e.get_raw( "duration" ), time_duration::units );
717 } else {
718 time = time_duration::from_turns( e.get_int( "duration", 0 ) );
719 }
720 if( e.get_bool( "permanent", false ) ) {
721 effect_data ret( efftype_id( e.get_string( "id" ) ), time,
722 get_body_part_token( e.get_string( "bp", "NUM_BP" ) ) );
723 ret.permanent = true;
724 if( json_report_strict ) {
725 try {
726 e.throw_error( "Effect permanence has been moved to effect_type. Set permanence there.",
727 "permanent" );
728 } catch( const JsonError &ex ) {
729 debugmsg( "\n%s", ex.what() );
730 }
731 }
732 return ret;
733 } else {
734 return effect_data( efftype_id( e.get_string( "id" ) ), time,
735 get_body_part_token( e.get_string( "bp", "NUM_BP" ) ) );
736 }
737}
738
739void consume_drug_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
740{
741 obj.read( "activation_message", activation_message );
742 obj.read( "charges_needed", charges_needed );
743 obj.read( "tools_needed", tools_needed );
744
745 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
746 for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
747 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
748 }
749 }
750 obj.read( "stat_adjustments", stat_adjustments );
751 obj.read( "fields_produced", fields_produced );
752 obj.read( "moves", moves );
753
754 for( JsonArray vit : obj.get_array( "vitamins" ) ) {
755 auto lo = vit.get_int( 1 );
756 auto hi = vit.size() >= 3 ? vit.get_int( 2 ) : lo;
757 vitamins.emplace( vitamin_id( vit.get_string( 0 ) ), std::make_pair( lo, hi ) );
758 }
759
760 used_up_item = obj.get_string( "used_up_item", used_up_item );
761
762}
763
764void consume_drug_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
765{
766 const std::string vits = enumerate_as_string( vitamins.begin(), vitamins.end(),
767 []( const decltype( vitamins )::value_type & v ) {
768 const time_duration rate = get_player_character().vitamin_rate( v.first );
769 if( rate <= 0_turns ) {
770 return std::string();
771 }
772 const int lo = static_cast<int>( v.second.first * rate / 1_days * 100 );
773 const int hi = static_cast<int>( v.second.second * rate / 1_days * 100 );
774
775 return string_format( lo == hi ? "%s (%i%%)" : "%s (%i-%i%%)", v.first.obj().name(), lo,
776 hi );
777 } );
778
779 if( !vits.empty() ) {
780 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Vitamins (RDA): " ), vits );
781 }
782
783 if( tools_needed.count( itype_syringe ) ) {
784 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "You need a <info>syringe</info> to inject this drug." ) );
785 }
786}
787
788int consume_drug_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
789{
790 auto need_these = tools_needed;
791 if( need_these.count( itype_syringe ) && p.has_bionic( bio_syringe ) ) {
792 need_these.erase( itype_syringe ); // no need for a syringe with bionics like these!
793 }
794 // Check prerequisites first.
795 for( const auto &tool : need_these ) {
796 // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
797 if( !p.has_amount( tool.first, 1 ) ) {
798 p.add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
799 _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
800 item::nname( tool.first ),
801 it.type_name( 1 ) );
802 return -1;
803 }
804 }
805 for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
806 // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
807 if( !p.has_charges( consumable.first, ( consumable.second == -1 ) ?
808 1 : consumable.second ) ) {
809 p.add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
810 _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" ),
811 item::nname( consumable.first ),
812 it.type_name( 1 ) );
813 return -1;
814 }
815 }
816 // Apply the various effects.
817 for( const auto &eff : effects ) {
818 time_duration dur = eff.duration;
819 if( p.has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
820 dur *= .8;
821 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
822 dur *= 1.2;
823 }
824 p.add_effect( eff.id, dur, eff.bp );
825 if( eff.permanent ) {
826 p.get_effect( eff.id, eff.bp ).set_permanent();
827 }
828 }
829 for( const auto &stat_adjustment : stat_adjustments ) {
830 p.mod_stat( stat_adjustment.first, stat_adjustment.second );
831 }
832 map &here = get_map();
833 for( const auto &field : fields_produced ) {
834 const field_type_id fid = field_type_id( field.first );
835 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
836 here.add_field( {p.posx() + static_cast<int>( rng( -2, 2 ) ), p.posy() + static_cast<int>( rng( -2, 2 ) ), p.posz()},
837 fid,
838 field.second );
839 }
840 }
841
842 // for vitamins that accumulate (max > 0) multivitamins risk causing hypervitaminosis
843 for( const auto &v : vitamins ) {
844 // players with mutations that remove the requirement for a vitamin cannot suffer accumulation of it
845 p.vitamin_mod( v.first, rng( v.second.first, v.second.second ),
846 p.vitamin_rate( v.first ) <= 0_turns );
847 }
848
849 // Output message.
850 p.add_msg_if_player( _( activation_message ), it.type_name( 1 ) );
851 // Consume charges.
852 for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
853 if( consumable.second != -1 ) {
854 p.use_charges( consumable.first, consumable.second );
855 }
856 }
857
858 if( !used_up_item.empty() ) {
859 item used_up( used_up_item, it.birthday() );
860 p.i_add_or_drop( used_up );
861 }
862
863 p.moves -= moves;
864 return it.type->charges_to_use();
865}
866
867std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> delayed_transform_iuse::clone() const
868{
869 return std::make_unique<delayed_transform_iuse>( *this );
870}
871
872void delayed_transform_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
873{
874 iuse_transform::load( obj );
875 not_ready_msg = obj.get_string( "not_ready_msg" );
876 transform_age = obj.get_int( "transform_age" );
877}
878
879int delayed_transform_iuse::time_to_do( const item &it ) const
880{
881 // TODO: change return type to time_duration
882 return transform_age - to_turns<int>( it.age() );
883}
884
885int delayed_transform_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
886{
887 if( time_to_do( it ) > 0 ) {
888 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( not_ready_msg ) );
889 return 0;
890 }
891 return iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
892}
893
894std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> set_transform_iuse::clone() const
895{
896 return std::make_unique<set_transform_iuse>( *this );
897}
898
899void set_transform_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
900{
901 iuse_transform::load( obj );
902 obj.read( "turn_off", turn_off );
903 obj.read( "flag", flag );
904 if( !obj.read( "set_charges_msg", set_charges_msg ) ) {
905 set_charges_msg = to_translation( "The %s is empty!" );
906 }
907
908 if( !obj.read( "set_charges", set_charges ) ) {
909 set_charges = 0;
910 }
911 set_charges = std::max( set_charges, 0 );
912}
913
914int set_transform_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
915{
916 if( t ) {
917 return 0; // invoked from active item processing, do nothing.
918 }
919
920 const bool possess = p.has_item( it ) ||
921 ( it.has_flag( "ALLOWS_REMOTE_USE" ) && square_dist( p.pos(), pos ) == 1 );
922
923 if( set_charges ) {
924 if( it.is_power_armor() && p.can_interface_armor() ) {
925 if( !p.has_power() ) {
926 if( possess ) {
927 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, set_charges_msg, it.tname() );
928 }
929 return 0;
930 }
931 } else if( it.units_remaining( p ) < set_charges ) {
932 if( possess ) {
933 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, set_charges_msg, it.tname() );
934 }
935 return 0;
936 }
937 }
938
939 iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
940
941 for( auto &elem : p.worn ) {
942 if( elem.has_flag( flag ) && elem.active == turn_off ) {
943 if( elem.type->can_use( "set_transformed" ) ) {
944 const set_transformed_iuse *actor = dynamic_cast<const set_transformed_iuse *>
945 ( elem.get_use( "set_transformed" )->get_actor_ptr() );
946 if( actor == nullptr ) {
947 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
948 } else {
949 actor->bypass( p, elem, t, pos );
950 }
951 } else {
952 debugmsg( "Expected set_transformed function" );
953 }
954 }
955 }
956 return 0;
957}
958
959std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> set_transformed_iuse::clone() const
960{
961 return std::make_unique<set_transformed_iuse>( *this );
962}
963
964void set_transformed_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
965{
966 iuse_transform::load( obj );
967 obj.read( "restricted", restricted );
968 obj.read( "dependencies", dependencies );
969}
970
971int set_transformed_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
972{
973 if( t ) {
974 return 0; // invoked from active item processing, do nothing.
975 }
976
977 iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
978
979 return 0;
980}
981
982int set_transformed_iuse::bypass( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &pos ) const
983{
984 return iuse_transform::use( p, it, t, pos );
985}
986
987ret_val<bool> set_transformed_iuse::can_use( const Character &, const item &, bool,
988 const tripoint & ) const
989{
990 if( restricted ) {
991 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Activate via main piece." ) );
992 }
993 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
994
995}
996
997std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_monster_iuse::clone() const
998{
999 return std::make_unique<place_monster_iuse>( *this );
1000}
1001
1002void place_monster_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1003{
1004 mtypeid = mtype_id( obj.get_string( "monster_id" ) );
1005 obj.read( "friendly_msg", friendly_msg );
1006 obj.read( "hostile_msg", hostile_msg );
1007 obj.read( "difficulty", difficulty );
1008 obj.read( "moves", moves );
1009 obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
1010 obj.read( "is_pet", is_pet );
1011 if( obj.has_array( "skills" ) ) {
1012 JsonArray skills_ja = obj.get_array( "skills" );
1013 for( JsonValue s : skills_ja ) {
1014 skills.emplace( skill_id( s.get_string() ) );
1015 }
1016 }
1017}
1018
1019int place_monster_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1020{
1021 shared_ptr_fast<monster> newmon_ptr = make_shared_fast<monster>( mtypeid );
1022 monster &newmon = *newmon_ptr;
1023 newmon.init_from_item( it );
1024 if( place_randomly ) {
1025 // place_critter_around returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
1026 if( !g->place_critter_around( newmon_ptr, p.pos(), 1 ) ) {
1027 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no adjacent square to release the %s in!" ),
1028 newmon.name() );
1029 return 0;
1030 }
1031 } else {
1032 const std::string query = string_format( _( "Place the %s where?" ), newmon.name() );
1033 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( query );
1034 if( !pnt_ ) {
1035 return 0;
1036 }
1037 // place_critter_at returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
1038 if( !g->place_critter_at( newmon_ptr, *pnt_ ) ) {
1039 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot place a %s there." ), newmon.name() );
1040 return 0;
1041 }
1042 }
1043 p.moves -= moves;
1044 if( !newmon.has_flag( MF_INTERIOR_AMMO ) ) {
1045 for( auto &amdef : newmon.ammo ) {
1046 item ammo_item( amdef.first, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
1047 const int available = p.charges_of( amdef.first );
1048 if( available == 0 ) {
1049 amdef.second = 0;
1050 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1051 _( "If you had standard factory-built %1$s bullets, you could load the %2$s." ),
1052 ammo_item.type_name( 2 ), newmon.name() );
1053 continue;
1054 }
1055 // Don't load more than the default from the monster definition.
1056 ammo_item.charges = std::min( available, amdef.second );
1057 p.use_charges( amdef.first, ammo_item.charges );
1058 //~ First %s is the ammo item (with plural form and count included), second is the monster name
1059 p.add_msg_if_player( vgettext( "You load %1$d x %2$s round into the %3$s.",
1060 "You load %1$d x %2$s rounds into the %3$s.", ammo_item.charges ),
1061 ammo_item.charges, ammo_item.type_name( ammo_item.charges ),
1062 newmon.name() );
1063 amdef.second = ammo_item.charges;
1064 }
1065 }
1066 int skill_offset = 0;
1067 for( const skill_id &sk : skills ) {
1068 skill_offset += p.get_skill_level( sk );
1069 }
1070 /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of a placed turret being friendly */
1071 if( rng( 0, p.int_cur ) + skill_offset < rng( 0, 2 * difficulty ) ) {
1072 if( hostile_msg.empty() ) {
1073 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The %s scans you and makes angry beeping noises!" ),
1074 newmon.name() );
1075 } else {
1076 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", _( hostile_msg ) );
1077 }
1078 } else {
1079 if( friendly_msg.empty() ) {
1080 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The %s emits an IFF beep as it scans you." ),
1081 newmon.name() );
1082 } else {
1083 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, "%s", _( friendly_msg ) );
1084 }
1085 newmon.friendly = -1;
1086 if( is_pet ) {
1087 newmon.add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, num_bp );
1088 }
1089 }
1090 // TODO: add a flag instead of monster id or something?
1091 if( newmon.type->id == mtype_id( "mon_laserturret" ) && !g->is_in_sunlight( newmon.pos() ) ) {
1092 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "A flashing LED on the laser turret appears to indicate low light." ) );
1093 }
1094 return 1;
1095}
1096
1097std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_npc_iuse::clone() const
1098{
1099 return std::make_unique<place_npc_iuse>( *this );
1100}
1101
1102void place_npc_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1103{
1104 npc_class_id = string_id<npc_template>( obj.get_string( "npc_class_id" ) );
1105 obj.read( "summon_msg", summon_msg );
1106 obj.read( "moves", moves );
1107 obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
1108}
1109
1110int place_npc_iuse::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1111{
1112 map &here = get_map();
1113 cata::optional<tripoint> target_pos;
1114 if( place_randomly ) {
1115 const tripoint_range<tripoint> target_range = points_in_radius( p.pos(), 1 );
1116 target_pos = random_point( target_range, []( const tripoint & t ) {
1117 return !get_map().passable( t );
1118 } );
1119 } else {
1120 const std::string query = _( "Place npc where?" );
1121 target_pos = choose_adjacent( _( "Place npc where?" ) );
1122 }
1123 if( !target_pos ) {
1124 return 0;
1125 }
1126 if( !here.passable( target_pos.value() ) ) {
1127 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no square to spawn npc in!" ) );
1128 return 0;
1129 }
1130
1131 here.place_npc( target_pos.value().xy(), npc_class_id );
1132 p.mod_moves( -moves );
1133 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", _( summon_msg ) );
1134 return 1;
1135}
1136
1137std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> pick_lock_actor::clone() const
1138{
1139 return std::make_unique<pick_lock_actor>( *this );
1140}
1141
1142void pick_lock_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1143{
1144 pick_quality = obj.get_int( "pick_quality" );
1145}
1146
1147int pick_lock_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1148{
1149 if( p.is_npc() ) {
1150 return 0;
1151 }
1152
1153 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1154 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
1155 return 0;
1156 }
1157
1158 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = []( const tripoint & pnt ) {
1159 if( pnt == g->u.pos() ) {
1160 return false;
1161 }
1162 const ter_id ter = g->m.ter( pnt );
1163 const furn_id furn = g->m.furn( pnt );
1164 lockpicking_open_result result = get_lockpicking_open_result( ter, furn );
1165 const bool is_allowed = result.new_ter_type || result.new_furn_type;
1166 return is_allowed;
1167 };
1168
1169 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
1170 _( "Use your lockpick where?" ), _( "There is nothing to lockpick nearby." ), f, false );
1171 if( !pnt_ ) {
1172 return 0;
1173 }
1174 const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
1175 const ter_id type = g->m.ter( pnt );
1176 if( !f( pnt ) ) {
1177 if( pnt == p.pos() ) {
1178 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You pick your nose and your sinuses swing open." ) );
1179 } else if( g->critter_at<npc>( pnt ) ) {
1180 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1181 _( "You can pick your friends, and you can\npick your nose, but you can't pick\nyour friend's nose." ) );
1182 } else if( type == t_door_c ) {
1183 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That door isn't locked." ) );
1184 } else {
1185 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That cannot be picked." ) );
1186 }
1187 return 0;
1188 }
1189
1190 /** @EFFECT_DEX speeds up door lock picking */
1191 /** @EFFECT_LOCKPICK speeds up door lock picking */
1192 const int duration = std::max( 0,
1193 to_moves<int>( 10_minutes - time_duration::from_minutes( it.get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK ) ) ) -
1194 ( p.dex_cur + 5 ) * 2300 );
1195
1196 p.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_LOCKPICK" ), duration, -1, p.get_item_position( &it ) );
1197 p.activity.targets.push_back( item_location( p, &it ) );
1198 p.activity.placement = pnt;
1199
1200 return it.type->charges_to_use();
1201}
1202
1203std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_furn_actor::clone() const
1204{
1205 return std::make_unique<deploy_furn_actor>( *this );
1206}
1207
1208void deploy_furn_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
1209{
1210 std::vector<std::string> can_function_as;
1211 const furn_t &the_furn = furn_type.obj();
1212 const std::string furn_name = the_furn.name();
1213
1214 if( the_furn.workbench ) {
1215 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a <info>crafting station</info>" ) );
1216 }
1217 if( the_furn.has_flag( "BUTCHER_EQ" ) ) {
1218 can_function_as.emplace_back(
1219 _( "a place to hang <info>corpses for butchering</info>" ) );
1220 }
1221 if( the_furn.has_flag( "FLAT_SURF" ) ) {
1222 can_function_as.emplace_back(
1223 _( "a flat surface to <info>butcher</info> onto or <info>eat meals</info> from" ) );
1224 }
1225 if( the_furn.has_flag( "CAN_SIT" ) ) {
1226 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>sit</info>" ) );
1227 }
1228 if( the_furn.has_flag( "HIDE_PLACE" ) ) {
1229 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>hide</info>" ) );
1230 }
1231 if( the_furn.has_flag( "FIRE_CONTAINER" ) ) {
1232 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a safe place to <info>contain a fire</info>" ) );
1233 }
1234 if( the_furn.crafting_pseudo_item == itype_char_smoker ) {
1235 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>smoke or dry food</info> for preservation" ) );
1236 }
1237
1238 if( can_function_as.empty() ) {
1239 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1240 string_format( _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>)." ),
1241 furn_name ) );
1242 } else {
1243 std::string furn_usages = enumerate_as_string( can_function_as, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
1244 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1245 string_format(
1246 _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>), which can then be used as %s." ),
1247 furn_name, furn_usages ) );
1248 }
1249}
1250
1251void deploy_furn_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1252{
1253 furn_type = furn_str_id( obj.get_string( "furn_type" ) );
1254}
1255
1256int deploy_furn_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint &pos ) const
1257{
1258 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1259 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
1260 return 0;
1261 }
1262 tripoint pnt = pos;
1263 if( pos == p.pos() ) {
1264 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Deploy where?" ) ) ) {
1265 pnt = *pnt_;
1266 } else {
1267 return 0;
1268 }
1269 }
1270
1271 if( pnt == p.pos() ) {
1272 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1273 _( "You attempt to become one with the furniture. It doesn't work." ) );
1274 return 0;
1275 }
1276
1277 map &here = get_map();
1278 optional_vpart_position veh_there = here.veh_at( pnt );
1279 if( veh_there.has_value() ) {
1280 // TODO: check for protrusion+short furniture, wheels+tiny furniture, NOCOLLIDE flag, etc.
1281 // and/or integrate furniture deployment with construction (which already seems to perform these checks sometimes?)
1282 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The space under %s is too cramped to deploy a %s in." ),
1283 veh_there.value().vehicle().disp_name(), it.tname() );
1284 return 0;
1285 }
1286
1287 // For example: dirt = 2, long grass = 3
1288 if( here.move_cost( pnt ) != 2 && here.move_cost( pnt ) != 3 ) {
1289 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't deploy a %s there." ), it.tname() );
1290 return 0;
1291 }
1292
1293 if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
1294 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is already furniture at that location." ) );
1295 return 0;
1296 }
1297
1298 here.furn_set( pnt, furn_type );
1299 p.mod_moves( to_turns<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1300 return 1;
1301}
1302
1303std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> reveal_map_actor::clone() const
1304{
1305 return std::make_unique<reveal_map_actor>( *this );
1306}
1307
1308void reveal_map_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1309{
1310 radius = obj.get_int( "radius" );
1311 message = obj.get_string( "message" );
1312 std::string ter;
1313 ot_match_type ter_match_type;
1314 for( const JsonValue entry : obj.get_array( "terrain" ) ) {
1315 if( entry.test_string() ) {
1316 ter = entry.get_string();
1317 ter_match_type = ot_match_type::contains;
1318 } else {
1319 JsonObject jo = entry.get_object();
1320 ter = jo.get_string( "om_terrain" );
1321 ter_match_type = jo.get_enum_value<ot_match_type>( "om_terrain_match_type",
1322 ot_match_type::contains );
1323 }
1324 omt_types.push_back( std::make_pair( ter, ter_match_type ) );
1325 }
1326}
1327
1328void reveal_map_actor::reveal_targets( const tripoint_abs_omt &center,
1329 const std::pair<std::string, ot_match_type> &target,
1330 int reveal_distance ) const
1331{
1332 const auto places = overmap_buffer.find_all( center, target.first, radius, false,
1333 target.second );
1334 for( auto &place : places ) {
1335 overmap_buffer.reveal( place, reveal_distance );
1336 }
1337}
1338
1339int reveal_map_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
1340{
1341 if( it.already_used_by_player( p ) ) {
1342 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "There isn't anything new on the %s." ), it.tname() );
1343 return 0;
1344 } else if( g->get_levz() < 0 ) {
1345 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You should read your %s when you get to the surface." ),
1346 it.tname() );
1347 return 0;
1348 } else if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
1349 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
1350 return 0;
1351 }
1352 const tripoint_abs_omt center( it.get_var( "reveal_map_center_omt",
1353 p.global_omt_location().raw() ) );
1354 for( auto &omt : omt_types ) {
1355 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1356 reveal_targets( tripoint_abs_omt( center.xy(), z ), omt, 0 );
1357 }
1358 }
1359 if( !message.empty() ) {
1360 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, "%s", _( message ) );
1361 }
1362 it.mark_as_used_by_player( p );
1363 return 0;
1364}
1365
1366void firestarter_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1367{
1368 moves_cost_fast = obj.get_int( "moves", moves_cost_fast );
1369 moves_cost_slow = obj.get_int( "moves_slow", moves_cost_fast * 10 );
1370 need_sunlight = obj.get_bool( "need_sunlight", false );
1371}
1372
1373std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> firestarter_actor::clone() const
1374{
1375 return std::make_unique<firestarter_actor>( *this );
1376}
1377
1378bool firestarter_actor::prep_firestarter_use( const player &p, tripoint &pos )
1379{
1380 // checks for fuel are handled by use and the activity, not here
1381 if( pos == p.pos() ) {
1382 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Light where?" ) ) ) {
1383 pos = *pnt_;
1384 } else {
1385 return false;
1386 }
1387 }
1388 if( pos == p.pos() ) {
1389 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You would set yourself on fire." ) );
1390 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "But you're already smokin' hot." ) );
1391 return false;
1392 }
1393 map &here = get_map();
1394 if( here.get_field( pos, fd_fire ) ) {
1395 // check if there's already a fire
1396 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is already a fire." ) );
1397 return false;
1398 }
1399 // Check for a brazier.
1400 bool has_unactivated_brazier = false;
1401 for( const item &i : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
1402 if( i.typeId() == itype_brazier ) {
1403 has_unactivated_brazier = true;
1404 }
1405 }
1406 return !has_unactivated_brazier ||
1407 query_yn(
1408 _( "There's a brazier there but you haven't set it up to contain the fire. Continue?" ) );
1409}
1410
1411void firestarter_actor::resolve_firestarter_use( player &p, const tripoint &pos )
1412{
1413 if( get_map().add_field( pos, fd_fire, 1, 10_minutes ) ) {
1414 if( !p.has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
1415 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You successfully light a fire." ) );
1416 } else {
1417 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
1418 p.add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
1419 _( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more." ) );
1420 } else {
1421 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire." ) );
1422 p.add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 6_hours, 4_hours );
1423 p.rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
1424 }
1425 }
1426 }
1427}
1428
1429ret_val<bool> firestarter_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
1430 const tripoint & ) const
1431{
1432 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1433 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
1434 }
1435
1436 if( it.ammo_remaining() < it.ammo_required() ) {
1437 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
1438 }
1439
1440 if( need_sunlight && light_mod( p.pos() ) <= 0.0f ) {
1441 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need direct sunlight to light a fire with this." ) );
1442 }
1443
1444 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
1445}
1446
1447float firestarter_actor::light_mod( const tripoint &pos ) const
1448{
1449 if( !need_sunlight ) {
1450 return 1.0f;
1451 }
1452
1453 const float light_level = g->natural_light_level( pos.z );
1454 if( get_weather().weather_id->sun_intensity >= sun_intensity_type::normal &&
1455 light_level >= 60.0f && weather::is_sheltered( get_map(), pos ) ) {
1456 return std::pow( light_level / 80.0f, 8 );
1457 }
1458
1459 return 0.0f;
1460}
1461
1462int firestarter_actor::moves_cost_by_fuel( const tripoint &pos ) const
1463{
1464 map &here = get_map();
1465 if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 100 ) ) {
1466 return moves_cost_fast;
1467 }
1468
1469 if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 10 ) ) {
1470 return ( moves_cost_slow + moves_cost_fast ) / 2;
1471 }
1472
1473 return moves_cost_slow;
1474}
1475
1476int firestarter_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint &spos ) const
1477{
1478 if( t ) {
1479 return 0;
1480 }
1481
1482 tripoint pos = spos;
1483 float light = light_mod( p.pos() );
1484 if( !prep_firestarter_use( p, pos ) ) {
1485 return 0;
1486 }
1487
1488 double skill_level = p.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1489 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL speeds up fire starting */
1490 float moves_modifier = std::pow( 0.8, std::min( 5.0, skill_level ) );
1491 const int moves_base = moves_cost_by_fuel( pos );
1492 const double moves_per_turn = to_moves<double>( 1_turns );
1493 const int min_moves = std::min<int>(
1494 moves_base, std::sqrt( 1 + moves_base / moves_per_turn ) * moves_per_turn );
1495 const int moves = std::max<int>( min_moves, moves_base * moves_modifier ) / light;
1496 if( moves > to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) ) {
1497 // If more than 1 minute, inform the player
1498 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_sunlight ?
1499 _( "If the current weather holds, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire." ) :
1500 _( "At your skill level, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire." ),
1501 moves / to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) );
1502 } else if( moves < to_moves<int>( 2_turns ) && get_map().is_flammable( pos ) ) {
1503 // If less than 2 turns, don't start a long action
1504 resolve_firestarter_use( p, pos );
1505 p.mod_moves( -moves );
1506 return it.type->charges_to_use();
1507 }
1508
1509 // skill gains are handled by the activity, but stored here in the index field
1510 const int potential_skill_gain =
1511 moves_modifier + moves_cost_fast / 100.0 + 2;
1512 p.assign_activity( ACT_START_FIRE, moves, potential_skill_gain,
1513 0, it.tname() );
1514 p.activity.targets.push_back( item_location( p, &it ) );
1515 p.activity.values.push_back( g->natural_light_level( pos.z ) );
1516 p.activity.placement = pos;
1517 // charges to use are handled by the activity
1518 return 0;
1519}
1520
1521void salvage_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1522{
1523 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1524 assign( obj, "moves_per_part", moves_per_part );
1525
1526 if( obj.has_array( "material_whitelist" ) ) {
1527 material_whitelist.clear();
1528 assign( obj, "material_whitelist", material_whitelist );
1529 }
1530}
1531
1532std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> salvage_actor::clone() const
1533{
1534 return std::make_unique<salvage_actor>( *this );
1535}
1536
1537int salvage_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
1538{
1539 if( t ) {
1540 return 0;
1541 }
1542
1543 auto item_loc = game_menus::inv::salvage( p, this );
1544 if( !item_loc ) {
1545 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
1546 return 0;
1547 }
1548
1549 if( !try_to_cut_up( p, *item_loc.get_item() ) ) {
1550 // Messages should have already been displayed.
1551 return 0;
1552 }
1553
1554 return cut_up( p, it, item_loc );
1555}
1556
1557static const units::volume minimal_volume_to_cut = 250_ml;
1558
1559int salvage_actor::time_to_cut_up( const item &it ) const
1560{
1561 int count = it.volume() / minimal_volume_to_cut;
1562 return moves_per_part * count;
1563}
1564
1565bool salvage_actor::valid_to_cut_up( const item &it ) const
1566{
1567 if( it.is_null() ) {
1568 return false;
1569 }
1570 // There must be some historical significance to these items.
1571 if( !it.is_salvageable() ) {
1572 return false;
1573 }
1574 if( !it.only_made_of( material_whitelist ) ) {
1575 return false;
1576 }
1577 if( !it.contents.empty() ) {
1578 return false;
1579 }
1580 if( it.volume() < minimal_volume_to_cut ) {
1581 return false;
1582 }
1583
1584 return true;
1585}
1586
1587// it here is the item that is a candidate for being chopped up.
1588// This is the former valid_to_cut_up with all the messages and queries
1589bool salvage_actor::try_to_cut_up( player &p, item &it ) const
1590{
1591 int pos = p.get_item_position( &it );
1592
1593 if( it.is_null() ) {
1594 add_msg( m_info, _( "You do not have that item." ) );
1595 return false;
1596 }
1597 // There must be some historical significance to these items.
1598 if( !it.is_salvageable() ) {
1599 add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't salvage anything from %s." ), it.tname() );
1600 if( p.rate_action_disassemble( it ) != hint_rating::cant ) {
1601 add_msg( m_info, _( "Try disassembling the %s instead." ), it.tname() );
1602 }
1603 return false;
1604 }
1605
1606 if( !it.only_made_of( material_whitelist ) ) {
1607 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is made of material that cannot be cut up." ), it.tname() );
1608 return false;
1609 }
1610 if( !it.contents.empty() ) {
1611 add_msg( m_info, _( "Please empty the %s before cutting it up." ), it.tname() );
1612 return false;
1613 }
1614 if( it.volume() < minimal_volume_to_cut ) {
1615 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is too small to salvage material from." ), it.tname() );
1616 return false;
1617 }
1618 // Softer warnings at the end so we don't ask permission and then tell them no.
1619 if( &it == &p.weapon ) {
1620 if( !query_yn( _( "You are wielding that, are you sure?" ) ) ) {
1621 return false;
1622 }
1623 } else if( pos == INT_MIN ) {
1624 // Not in inventory
1625 return true;
1626 } else if( pos < -1 ) {
1627 if( !query_yn( _( "You're wearing that, are you sure?" ) ) ) {
1628 return false;
1629 }
1630 }
1631
1632 return true;
1633}
1634
1635// function returns charges from it during the cutting process of the *cut.
1636// it cuts
1637// cut gets cut
1638int salvage_actor::cut_up( player &p, item &it, item_location &cut ) const
1639{
1640 const bool filthy = cut.get_item()->is_filthy();
1641 // total number of raw components == total volume of item.
1642 // This can go awry if there is a volume / recipe mismatch.
1643 int count = cut.get_item()->volume() / minimal_volume_to_cut;
1644 // Chance of us losing a material component to entropy.
1645 /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION reduces chance of losing components when cutting items up */
1646 int entropy_threshold = std::max( 5, 10 - p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ) );
1647 // What material components can we get back?
1648 std::vector<material_id> cut_material_components = cut.get_item()->made_of();
1649 // What materials do we salvage (ids and counts).
1650 std::map<itype_id, int> materials_salvaged;
1651
1652 // Final just in case check (that perhaps was not done elsewhere);
1653 if( cut.get_item() == &it ) {
1654 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can not cut the %s with itself." ), it.tname() );
1655 return 0;
1656 }
1657 if( !cut.get_item()->contents.empty() ) {
1658 // Should have been ensured by try_to_cut_up
1659 debugmsg( "tried to cut a non-empty item %s", cut.get_item()->tname() );
1660 return 0;
1661 }
1662
1663 // Time based on number of components.
1664 p.moves -= moves_per_part * count;
1665 // Not much practice, and you won't get very far ripping things up.
1666 p.practice( skill_fabrication, rng( 0, 5 ), 1 );
1667
1668 // Higher fabrication, less chance of entropy, but still a chance.
1669 if( rng( 1, 10 ) <= entropy_threshold ) {
1670 count -= 1;
1671 }
1672 // Fail dex roll, potentially lose more parts.
1673 /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly reduces component loss when cutting items up */
1674 if( dice( 3, 4 ) > p.dex_cur ) {
1675 count -= rng( 0, 2 );
1676 }
1677 // If more than 1 material component can still be salvaged,
1678 // chance of losing more components if the item is damaged.
1679 // If the item being cut is not damaged, no additional losses will be incurred.
1680 if( count > 0 && cut.get_item()->damage() > 0 ) {
1681 float component_success_chance = std::min( std::pow( 0.8, cut.get_item()->damage_level( 4 ) ),
1682 1.0 );
1683 for( int i = count; i > 0; i-- ) {
1684 if( component_success_chance < rng_float( 0, 1 ) ) {
1685 count--;
1686 }
1687 }
1688 }
1689
1690 // Decided to split components evenly. Since salvage will likely change
1691 // soon after I write this, I'll go with the one that is cleaner.
1692 for( const material_id &material : cut_material_components ) {
1693 if( const auto id = material->salvaged_into() ) {
1694 materials_salvaged[*id] = std::max( 0, count / static_cast<int>( cut_material_components.size() ) );
1695 }
1696 }
1697
1698 add_msg( m_info, _( "You try to salvage materials from the %s." ),
1699 cut.get_item()->tname() );
1700
1701 item_location::type cut_type = cut.where();
1702 tripoint pos = cut.position();
1703
1704 // Clean up before removing the item.
1705 remove_ammo( *cut.get_item(), p );
1706 // Original item has been consumed.
1707 cut.remove_item();
1708 // Force an encumbrance update in case they were wearing that item.
1709 p.reset_encumbrance();
1710
1711 map &here = get_map();
1712 for( const auto &salvaged : materials_salvaged ) {
1713 itype_id mat_name = salvaged.first;
1714 int amount = salvaged.second;
1715 item result( mat_name, calendar::turn );
1716 if( amount > 0 ) {
1717 add_msg( m_good, vgettext( "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", amount ),
1718 amount, result.display_name( amount ) );
1719 if( filthy ) {
1720 result.set_flag( "FILTHY" );
1721 }
1722 if( cut_type == item_location::type::character ) {
1723 p.i_add_or_drop( result, amount );
1724 } else {
1725 for( int i = 0; i < amount; i++ ) {
1726 here.spawn_an_item( pos.xy(), result, amount, 0 );
1727 }
1728 }
1729 } else {
1730 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Could not salvage a %s." ), result.display_name() );
1731 }
1732 }
1733 // No matter what, cutting has been done by the time we get here.
1734 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
1735}
1736
1737void inscribe_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1738{
1739 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1740 assign( obj, "on_items", on_items );
1741 assign( obj, "on_terrain", on_terrain );
1742 assign( obj, "material_restricted", material_restricted );
1743
1744 if( obj.has_array( "material_whitelist" ) ) {
1745 material_whitelist.clear();
1746 assign( obj, "material_whitelist", material_whitelist );
1747 }
1748
1749 assign( obj, "verb", verb );
1750 assign( obj, "gerund", gerund );
1751
1752 if( !on_items && !on_terrain ) {
1753 obj.throw_error(
1754 R"(Tried to create an useless inscribe_actor, at least on of "on_items" or "on_terrain" should be true)" );
1755 }
1756}
1757
1758std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> inscribe_actor::clone() const
1759{
1760 return std::make_unique<inscribe_actor>( *this );
1761}
1762
1763bool inscribe_actor::item_inscription( item &tool, item &cut ) const
1764{
1765 if( !cut.made_of( SOLID ) ) {
1766 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't inscribe an item that isn't solid!" ) );
1767 return false;
1768 }
1769
1770 if( material_restricted && !cut.made_of_any( material_whitelist ) ) {
1771 std::string lower_verb = verb.translated();
1772 std::transform( lower_verb.begin(), lower_verb.end(), lower_verb.begin(), ::tolower );
1773 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't %1$s %2$s because of the material it is made of." ),
1774 lower_verb, cut.display_name() );
1775 return false;
1776 }
1777
1778 enum inscription_type {
1779 INSCRIPTION_LABEL,
1780 INSCRIPTION_NOTE,
1781 };
1782
1783 uilist menu;
1784 menu.text = string_format( _( "%s meaning?" ), verb );
1785 menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_LABEL, true, -1, _( "It's a label" ) );
1786 menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_NOTE, true, -1, _( "It's a note" ) );
1787 menu.query();
1788
1789 std::string carving;
1790 std::string carving_tool;
1791 switch( menu.ret ) {
1792 case INSCRIPTION_LABEL:
1793 carving = "item_label";
1794 carving_tool = "item_label_tool";
1795 break;
1796 case INSCRIPTION_NOTE:
1797 carving = "item_note";
1798 carving_tool = "item_note_tool";
1799 break;
1800 default:
1801 return false;
1802 }
1803
1804 const bool hasnote = cut.has_var( carving );
1805 std::string messageprefix = ( hasnote ? _( "(To delete, clear the text and confirm)\n" ) : "" ) +
1806 //~ %1$s: gerund (e.g. carved), %2$s: item name
1807 string_format( pgettext( "carving", "%1$s on the %2$s is: " ),
1808 gerund, cut.type_name() );
1809
1810 string_input_popup popup;
1811 popup.title( string_format( _( "%s what?" ), verb ) )
1812 .width( 64 )
1813 .text( hasnote ? cut.get_var( carving ) : std::string() )
1814 .description( messageprefix )
1815 .identifier( "inscribe_item" )
1816 .max_length( 128 )
1817 .query();
1818 if( popup.canceled() ) {
1819 return false;
1820 }
1821 const std::string message = popup.text();
1822 if( message.empty() ) {
1823 cut.erase_var( carving );
1824 cut.erase_var( carving_tool );
1825 } else {
1826 cut.set_var( carving, message );
1827 cut.set_var( carving_tool, tool.typeId().str() );
1828 }
1829
1830 return true;
1831}
1832
1833int inscribe_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
1834{
1835 if( t ) {
1836 return 0;
1837 }
1838
1839 int choice = INT_MAX;
1840 if( on_terrain && on_items ) {
1841 uilist imenu;
1842 imenu.text = string_format( _( "%s on what?" ), verb );
1843 imenu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "The terrain" ) );
1844 imenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "An item" ) );
1845 imenu.query();
1846 choice = imenu.ret;
1847 } else if( on_terrain ) {
1848 choice = 0;
1849 } else {
1850 choice = 1;
1851 }
1852
1853 if( choice < 0 || choice > 1 ) {
1854 return 0;
1855 }
1856
1857 if( choice == 0 ) {
1858 const cata::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Write where?" ) );
1859 if( !dest_ ) {
1860 return 0;
1861 }
1862 return iuse::handle_ground_graffiti( p, &it, string_format( _( "%s what?" ), verb ),
1863 dest_.value() );
1864 }
1865
1866 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_menu( get_avatar(), _( "Inscribe which item?" ) );
1867 if( !loc ) {
1868 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
1869 return 0;
1870 }
1871 item &cut = *loc;
1872 if( &cut == &it ) {
1873 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to bend your %s, but fail." ), it.tname() );
1874 return 0;
1875 }
1876 // inscribe_item returns false if the action fails or is canceled somehow.
1877
1878 if( item_inscription( it, cut ) ) {
1879 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
1880 }
1881
1882 return 0;
1883}
1884
1885void cauterize_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1886{
1887 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1888 assign( obj, "flame", flame );
1889}
1890
1891std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> cauterize_actor::clone() const
1892{
1893 return std::make_unique<cauterize_actor>( *this );
1894}
1895
1896static heal_actor prepare_dummy()
1897{
1898 heal_actor dummy;
1899 dummy.limb_power = -2;
1900 dummy.head_power = -2;
1901 dummy.torso_power = -2;
1902 dummy.bleed = 1.0f;
1903 dummy.bite = 0.5f;
1904 dummy.move_cost = 100;
1905 return dummy;
1906}
1907
1908bool cauterize_actor::cauterize_effect( player &p, item &it, bool force )
1909{
1910 // TODO: Make this less hacky
1911 static const heal_actor dummy = prepare_dummy();
1912 hp_part hpart = dummy.use_healing_item( p, p, it, force );
1913 if( hpart != num_hp_parts ) {
1914 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You cauterize yourself." ) );
1915 if( !( p.has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) ) {
1916 p.mod_pain( 15 );
1917 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It hurts like hell!" ) );
1918 } else {
1919 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "It itches a little." ) );
1920 }
1921 const body_part bp = player::hp_to_bp( hpart );
1922 if( p.has_effect( effect_bite, bp ) ) {
1923 p.add_effect( effect_bite, 260_minutes, bp );
1924 }
1925
1926 p.moves = 0;
1927 return true;
1928 }
1929
1930 return false;
1931}
1932
1933int cauterize_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
1934{
1935 if( t ) {
1936 return 0;
1937 }
1938 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1939 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
1940 return 0;
1941 }
1942 bool has_disease = p.has_effect( effect_bite ) || p.has_effect( effect_bleed );
1943 bool did_cauterize = false;
1944
1945 if( has_disease ) {
1946 did_cauterize = cauterize_effect( p, it, false );
1947 } else {
1948 const bool can_have_fun = p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST ) || p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST_MED ) ||
1949 p.has_trait( trait_CENOBITE );
1950
1951 if( can_have_fun && query_yn( _( "Cauterize yourself for fun?" ) ) ) {
1952 did_cauterize = cauterize_effect( p, it, true );
1953 }
1954 }
1955
1956 if( !did_cauterize ) {
1957 return 0;
1958 }
1959
1960 if( flame ) {
1961 p.use_charges( itype_fire, 4 );
1962 return 0;
1963
1964 } else {
1965 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
1966 }
1967}
1968
1969ret_val<bool> cauterize_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
1970 const tripoint & ) const
1971{
1972 if( !p.has_effect( effect_bite ) &&
1973 !p.has_effect( effect_bleed ) &&
1974 !p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST ) &&
1975 !p.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST_MED ) &&
1976 !p.has_trait( trait_CENOBITE ) ) {
1977
1978 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure(
1979 _( "You are not bleeding or bitten, there is no need to cauterize yourself." ) );
1980 }
1981 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
1982 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You cannot cauterize while mounted." ) );
1983 }
1984
1985 if( flame ) {
1986 if( !p.has_charges( itype_fire, 4 ) ) {
1987 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure(
1988 _( "You need a source of flame (4 charges worth) before you can cauterize yourself." ) );
1989 }
1990 } else {
1991 if( !it.units_sufficient( p ) ) {
1992 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need at least %d charges to cauterize wounds." ),
1993 it.ammo_required() );
1994 }
1995 }
1996
1997 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1998 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
1999 }
2000
2001 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2002}
2003
2004void enzlave_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2005{
2006 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
2007}
2008
2009std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> enzlave_actor::clone() const
2010{
2011 return std::make_unique<enzlave_actor>( *this );
2012}
2013
2014int enzlave_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2015{
2016 if( t ) {
2017 return 0;
2018 }
2019 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2020 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
2021 return 0;
2022 }
2023 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( point( p.posx(), p.posy() ) );
2024 std::vector<const item *> corpses;
2025
2026 for( item &corpse_candidate : items ) {
2027 const mtype *mt = corpse_candidate.get_mtype();
2028 if( corpse_candidate.is_corpse() && mt->in_species( ZOMBIE ) &&
2029 mt->made_of( material_id( "flesh" ) ) &&
2030 mt->in_species( HUMAN ) && corpse_candidate.active && !corpse_candidate.has_var( "zlave" ) ) {
2031 corpses.push_back( &corpse_candidate );
2032 }
2033 }
2034
2035 if( corpses.empty() ) {
2036 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "No suitable corpses" ) );
2037 return 0;
2038 }
2039
2040 int tolerance_level = 9;
2041 if( p.has_trait( trait_PSYCHOPATH ) || p.has_trait( trait_SAPIOVORE ) ) {
2042 tolerance_level = 0;
2043 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED4" ) ) {
2044 tolerance_level = 5;
2045 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED3" ) ) {
2046 tolerance_level = 7;
2047 }
2048
2049 // Survival skill increases your willingness to get things done,
2050 // but it doesn't make you feel any less bad about it.
2051 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases tolerance for enzlavement */
2052 if( p.get_morale_level() <= ( 15 * ( tolerance_level - p.get_skill_level(
2053 skill_survival ) ) ) - 150 ) {
2054 add_msg( m_neutral,
2055 _( "The prospect of cutting up the corpse and letting it rise again as a slave is too much for you to deal with right now." ) );
2056 return 0;
2057 }
2058
2059 uilist amenu;
2060
2061 amenu.text = _( "Selectively butcher the downed zombie into a zombie slave?" );
2062 for( size_t i = 0; i < corpses.size(); i++ ) {
2063 amenu.addentry( i, true, -1, corpses[i]->display_name() );
2064 }
2065
2066 amenu.query();
2067
2068 if( amenu.ret < 0 ) {
2069 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Make love, not zlave." ) );
2070 return 0;
2071 }
2072
2073 if( tolerance_level == 0 ) {
2074 // You just don't care, no message.
2075 } else if( tolerance_level <= 5 ) {
2076 add_msg( m_neutral, _( "Well, it's more constructive than just chopping 'em into gooey meat…" ) );
2077 } else {
2078 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel horrible for mutilating and enslaving someone's corpse." ) );
2079
2080 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL decreases moral penalty and duration for enzlavement */
2081 int moraleMalus = -50 * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2082 int maxMalus = -250 * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2083 time_duration duration = 30_minutes * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2084 time_duration decayDelay = 3_minutes * ( 5.0 / p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2085
2086 if( p.has_trait( trait_PACIFIST ) ) {
2087 moraleMalus *= 5;
2088 maxMalus *= 3;
2089 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED1" ) ) {
2090 moraleMalus /= 4;
2091 } else if( p.has_trait_flag( "PRED2" ) ) {
2092 moraleMalus /= 5;
2093 }
2094
2095 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTILATE_CORPSE, moraleMalus, maxMalus, duration, decayDelay );
2096 }
2097
2098 const int selected_corpse = amenu.ret;
2099
2100 const item *body = corpses[selected_corpse];
2101 const mtype *mt = body->get_mtype();
2102
2103 // HP range for zombies is roughly 36 to 120, with the really big ones having 180 and 480 hp.
2104 // Speed range is 20 - 120 (for humanoids, dogs get way faster)
2105 // This gives us a difficulty ranging roughly from 10 - 40, with up to +25 for corpse damage.
2106 // An average zombie with an undamaged corpse is 0 + 8 + 14 = 22.
2107 int difficulty = ( body->damage_level( 4 ) * 5 ) + ( mt->hp / 10 ) + ( mt->speed / 5 );
2108 // 0 - 30
2109 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases chance of success for enzlavement */
2110
2111 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases chance of success for enzlavement */
2112
2113 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases chance of success for enzlavement */
2114 int skills = p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) + p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) +
2115 ( p.dex_cur / 2 );
2116 skills *= 2;
2117
2118 int success = rng( 0, skills ) - rng( 0, difficulty );
2119
2120 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID speeds up enzlavement */
2121 const int moves = difficulty * to_moves<int>( 12_seconds ) / p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
2122
2123 p.assign_activity( ACT_MAKE_ZLAVE, moves );
2124 p.activity.values.push_back( success );
2125 p.activity.str_values.push_back( corpses[selected_corpse]->display_name() );
2126
2127 return cost >= 0 ? cost : it.ammo_required();
2128}
2129
2130ret_val<bool> enzlave_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &, bool,
2131 const tripoint & ) const
2132{
2133 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL >=1 allows enzlavement */
2134
2135 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID >=1 allows enzlavement */
2136
2137 // TODO: Extract such checks into some kind of 'stat_requirements' class.
2138 if( p.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) < 1 ) {
2139 //~ %s - name of the required skill.
2140 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need at least %s 1." ),
2141 skill_survival->name() );
2142 }
2143 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2144 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
2145 }
2146 if( p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) < 1 ) {
2147 //~ %s - name of the required skill.
2148 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You need at least %s 1." ),
2149 skill_firstaid->name() );
2150 }
2151
2152 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2153}
2154
2155void fireweapon_off_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2156{
2157 obj.read( "target_id", target_id, true );
2158 success_message = obj.get_string( "success_message", "hsss" );
2159 lacks_fuel_message = obj.get_string( "lacks_fuel_message" );
2160 failure_message = obj.get_string( "failure_message", "hsss" );
2161 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2162 moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
2163 success_chance = obj.get_int( "success_chance", INT_MIN );
2164}
2165
2166std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_off_actor::clone() const
2167{
2168 return std::make_unique<fireweapon_off_actor>( *this );
2169}
2170
2171int fireweapon_off_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2172{
2173 if( t ) {
2174 return 0;
2175 }
2176
2177 if( it.charges <= 0 ) {
2178 p.add_msg_if_player( _( lacks_fuel_message ) );
2179 return 0;
2180 }
2181
2182 p.moves -= moves;
2183 if( rng( 0, 10 ) - it.damage_level( 4 ) > success_chance && !p.is_underwater() ) {
2184 if( noise > 0 ) {
2185 sounds::sound( p.pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( success_message ) );
2186 } else {
2187 p.add_msg_if_player( _( success_message ) );
2188 }
2189
2190 it.convert( target_id );
2191 it.active = true;
2192 } else if( !failure_message.empty() ) {
2193 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( failure_message ) );
2194 }
2195
2196 return it.type->charges_to_use();
2197}
2198
2199ret_val<bool> fireweapon_off_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
2200 const tripoint & ) const
2201{
2202 if( it.charges < it.type->charges_to_use() ) {
2203 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
2204 }
2205
2206 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2207 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
2208 }
2209
2210 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2211}
2212
2213void fireweapon_on_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2214{
2215 noise_message = obj.get_string( "noise_message", "hsss" );
2216 voluntary_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "voluntary_extinguish_message" );
2217 charges_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "charges_extinguish_message" );
2218 water_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "water_extinguish_message" );
2219 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2220 noise_chance = obj.get_int( "noise_chance", 1 );
2221 auto_extinguish_chance = obj.get_int( "auto_extinguish_chance", 0 );
2222 if( auto_extinguish_chance > 0 ) {
2223 auto_extinguish_message = obj.get_string( "auto_extinguish_message" );
2224 }
2225}
2226
2227std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_on_actor::clone() const
2228{
2229 return std::make_unique<fireweapon_on_actor>( *this );
2230}
2231
2232int fireweapon_on_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2233{
2234 bool extinguish = true;
2235 if( it.charges == 0 ) {
2236 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( charges_extinguish_message ) );
2237 } else if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2238 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( water_extinguish_message ) );
2239 } else if( auto_extinguish_chance > 0 && one_in( auto_extinguish_chance ) ) {
2240 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( auto_extinguish_message ) );
2241 } else if( !t ) {
2242 p.add_msg_if_player( _( voluntary_extinguish_message ) );
2243 } else {
2244 extinguish = false;
2245 }
2246
2247 if( extinguish ) {
2248 it.deactivate( &p, false );
2249
2250 } else if( one_in( noise_chance ) ) {
2251 if( noise > 0 ) {
2252 sounds::sound( p.pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( noise_message ) );
2253 } else {
2254 p.add_msg_if_player( _( noise_message ) );
2255 }
2256 }
2257
2258 return it.type->charges_to_use();
2259}
2260
2261void manualnoise_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2262{
2263 no_charges_message = obj.get_string( "no_charges_message" );
2264 use_message = obj.get_string( "use_message" );
2265 noise_message = obj.get_string( "noise_message", "hsss" );
2266 noise_id = obj.get_string( "noise_id", "misc" );
2267 noise_variant = obj.get_string( "noise_variant", "default" );
2268 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2269 moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
2270}
2271
2272std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> manualnoise_actor::clone() const
2273{
2274 return std::make_unique<manualnoise_actor>( *this );
2275}
2276
2277int manualnoise_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2278{
2279 if( t ) {
2280 return 0;
2281 }
2282 if( it.type->charges_to_use() != 0 && it.charges < it.type->charges_to_use() ) {
2283 p.add_msg_if_player( _( no_charges_message ) );
2284 return 0;
2285 }
2286 {
2287 p.moves -= moves;
2288 if( noise > 0 ) {
2289 sounds::sound( p.pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::activity,
2290 noise_message.empty() ? _( "Hsss" ) : _( noise_message ), true, noise_id, noise_variant );
2291 }
2292 p.add_msg_if_player( _( use_message ) );
2293 }
2294 return it.type->charges_to_use();
2295}
2296
2297ret_val<bool> manualnoise_actor::can_use( const Character &, const item &it, bool,
2298 const tripoint & ) const
2299{
2300 if( it.charges < it.type->charges_to_use() ) {
2301 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." ) );
2302 }
2303
2304 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2305}
2306
2307std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> musical_instrument_actor::clone() const
2308{
2309 return std::make_unique<musical_instrument_actor>( *this );
2310}
2311
2312void musical_instrument_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2313{
2314 speed_penalty = obj.get_int( "speed_penalty", 10 );
2315 volume = obj.get_int( "volume" );
2316 fun = obj.get_int( "fun" );
2317 fun_bonus = obj.get_int( "fun_bonus", 0 );
2318 if( !obj.read( "description_frequency", description_frequency ) ) {
2319 obj.throw_error( "missing member \"description_frequency\"" );
2320 }
2321 player_descriptions = obj.get_string_array( "player_descriptions" );
2322 npc_descriptions = obj.get_string_array( "npc_descriptions" );
2323}
2324
2325int musical_instrument_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
2326{
2327 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2328 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't play music while mounted." ),
2329 _( "<npcname> can't play music while mounted." ) );
2330 it.active = false;
2331 return 0;
2332 }
2333 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2334 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2335 _( "You can't play music underwater" ),
2336 _( "<npcname> can't play music underwater" ) );
2337 it.active = false;
2338 return 0;
2339 }
2340
2341 if( p.has_effect( effect_sleep ) || p.has_effect( effect_stunned ) ||
2342 p.has_effect( effect_asthma ) ) {
2343 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2344 _( "You stop playing your %s" ),
2345 _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s" ),
2346 it.display_name() );
2347 it.active = false;
2348 return 0;
2349 }
2350
2351 if( !t && it.active ) {
2352 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You stop playing your %s" ),
2353 _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s" ),
2354 it.display_name() );
2355 it.active = false;
2356 return 0;
2357 }
2358
2359 // Check for worn or wielded - no "floating"/bionic instruments for now
2360 // TODO: Distinguish instruments played with hands and with mouth, consider encumbrance
2361 const int inv_pos = p.get_item_position( &it );
2362 if( inv_pos >= 0 || inv_pos == INT_MIN ) {
2363 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2364 _( "You need to hold or wear %s to play it" ),
2365 _( "<npcname> needs to hold or wear %s to play it" ),
2366 it.display_name() );
2367 it.active = false;
2368 return 0;
2369 }
2370
2371 // At speed this low you can't coordinate your actions well enough to play the instrument
2372 if( p.get_speed() <= 25 + speed_penalty ) {
2373 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2374 _( "You feel too weak to play your %s" ),
2375 _( "<npcname> feels too weak to play their %s" ),
2376 it.display_name() );
2377 it.active = false;
2378 return 0;
2379 }
2380
2381 // We can play the music now
2382 if( !it.active ) {
2383 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
2384 _( "You start playing your %s" ),
2385 _( "<npcname> starts playing their %s" ),
2386 it.display_name() );
2387 it.active = true;
2388 }
2389
2390 if( p.get_effect_int( effect_playing_instrument ) <= speed_penalty ) {
2391 // Only re-apply the effect if it wouldn't lower the intensity
2392 p.add_effect( effect_playing_instrument, 2_turns, num_bp, speed_penalty );
2393 }
2394
2395 std::string desc = "music";
2396 /** @EFFECT_PER increases morale bonus when playing an instrument */
2397 const int morale_effect = fun + fun_bonus * p.per_cur;
2398 if( morale_effect >= 0 && calendar::once_every( description_frequency ) ) {
2399 if( !player_descriptions.empty() && p.is_player() ) {
2400 desc = _( random_entry( player_descriptions ) );
2401 } else if( !npc_descriptions.empty() && p.is_npc() ) {
2402 desc = string_format( _( "%1$s %2$s" ), p.disp_name( false ),
2403 random_entry( npc_descriptions ) );
2404 }
2405 } else if( morale_effect < 0 && calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
2406 // No musical skills = possible morale penalty
2407 if( p.is_player() ) {
2408 desc = _( "You produce an annoying sound" );
2409 } else {
2410 desc = string_format( _( "%s produces an annoying sound" ), p.disp_name( false ) );
2411 }
2412 }
2413
2414 if( morale_effect >= 0 ) {
2415 sounds::sound( p.pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument",
2416 it.typeId().str() );
2417 } else {
2418 sounds::sound( p.pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument_bad",
2419 it.typeId().str() );
2420 }
2421
2422 if( !p.has_effect( effect_music ) && p.can_hear( p.pos(), volume ) ) {
2423 // Sound code doesn't describe noises at the player position
2424 if( p.is_player() && desc != "music" ) {
2425 add_msg( m_info, desc );
2426 }
2427 p.add_effect( effect_music, 1_turns );
2428 const int sign = morale_effect > 0 ? 1 : -1;
2429 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUSIC, sign, morale_effect, 5_minutes, 2_minutes, true );
2430 }
2431
2432 return 0;
2433}
2434
2435ret_val<bool> musical_instrument_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &, bool,
2436 const tripoint & ) const
2437{
2438 // TODO: (maybe): Mouth encumbrance? Smoke? Lack of arms? Hand encumbrance?
2439 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2440 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
2441 }
2442 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2443 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
2444 }
2445
2446 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2447}
2448
2449std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> learn_spell_actor::clone() const
2450{
2451 return std::make_unique<learn_spell_actor>( *this );
2452}
2453
2454void learn_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2455{
2456 spells = obj.get_string_array( "spells" );
2457}
2458
2459void learn_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2460{
2461 std::string message;
2462 if( spells.size() == 1 ) {
2463 message = _( "This can teach you a spell." );
2464 } else {
2465 message = _( "This can teach you a number of spells." );
2466 }
2467 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2468 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "Spells Contained:" ) );
2469 for( const std::string &sp : spells ) {
2470 dump.emplace_back( "SPELL", spell_id( sp ).obj().name.translated() );
2471 }
2472}
2473
2474int learn_spell_actor::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2475{
2476 if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
2477 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
2478 return 0;
2479 }
2480 std::vector<uilist_entry> uilist_initializer;
2481 uilist spellbook_uilist;
2482 spellbook_callback sp_cb;
2483 bool know_it_all = true;
2484 for( const std::string &sp_id_str : spells ) {
2485 const spell_id sp_id( sp_id_str );
2486 sp_cb.add_spell( sp_id );
2487 uilist_entry entry( sp_id.obj().name.translated() );
2488 if( p.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2489 const spell sp = p.magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2490 entry.ctxt = string_format( _( "Level %u" ), sp.get_level() );
2491 if( sp.is_max_level() ) {
2492 entry.ctxt += _( " (Max)" );
2493 entry.enabled = false;
2494 } else {
2495 know_it_all = false;
2496 }
2497 } else {
