2498 if( p.magic->can_learn_spell( p, sp_id ) ) {
2499 entry.ctxt = _( "Study to Learn" );
2500 know_it_all = false;
2501 } else {
2502 entry.ctxt = _( "Can't learn!" );
2503 entry.enabled = false;
2504 }
2505 }
2506 uilist_initializer.emplace_back( entry );
2507 }
2508
2509 if( know_it_all ) {
2510 add_msg( m_info, _( "You already know everything this could teach you." ) );
2511 return 0;
2512 }
2513
2514 spellbook_uilist.entries = uilist_initializer;
2515 spellbook_uilist.w_height_setup = 24;
2516 spellbook_uilist.w_width_setup = 80;
2517 spellbook_uilist.callback = &sp_cb;
2518 spellbook_uilist.title = _( "Study a spell:" );
2519 spellbook_uilist.pad_left_setup = 38;
2520 spellbook_uilist.query();
2521 const int action = spellbook_uilist.ret;
2522 if( action < 0 ) {
2523 return 0;
2524 }
2525 const bool knows_spell = p.magic->knows_spell( spells[action] );
2526 player_activity study_spell( ACT_STUDY_SPELL,
2527 p.magic->time_to_learn_spell( p, spells[action] ) );
2528 study_spell.str_values = {
2529 "", // reserved for "until you gain a spell level" option [0]
2530 "learn"
2531 }; // [1]
2532 study_spell.values = { 0, 0, 0 };
2533 if( knows_spell ) {
2534 study_spell.str_values[1] = "study";
2535 const int study_time = uilist( _( "Spend how long studying?" ), {
2536 { to_moves<int>( 30_minutes ), true, -1, _( "30 minutes" ) },
2537 { to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), true, -1, _( "1 hour" ) },
2538 { to_moves<int>( 2_hours ), true, -1, _( "2 hours" ) },
2539 { to_moves<int>( 4_hours ), true, -1, _( "4 hours" ) },
2540 { to_moves<int>( 8_hours ), true, -1, _( "8 hours" ) },
2541 { 10100, true, -1, _( "Until you gain a spell level" ) }
2542 } );
2543 if( study_time <= 0 ) {
2544 return 0;
2545 }
2546 study_spell.moves_total = study_time;
2547 }
2548 study_spell.moves_left = study_spell.moves_total;
2549 if( study_spell.moves_total == 10100 ) {
2550 study_spell.str_values[0] = "gain_level";
2551 study_spell.values[0] = 0; // reserved for xp
2552 study_spell.values[1] = p.magic->get_spell( spell_id( spells[action] ) ).get_level() + 1;
2553 }
2554 study_spell.name = spells[action];
2555 p.assign_activity( study_spell, false );
2556 return 0;
2557}
2558
2559std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> cast_spell_actor::clone() const
2560{
2561 return std::make_unique<cast_spell_actor>( *this );
2562}
2563
2564void cast_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2565{
2566 no_fail = obj.get_bool( "no_fail" );
2567 item_spell = spell_id( obj.get_string( "spell_id" ) );
2568 spell_level = obj.get_int( "level" );
2569 need_worn = obj.get_bool( "need_worn", false );
2570 need_wielding = obj.get_bool( "need_wielding", false );
2571}
2572
2573void cast_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2574{
2575 //~ %1$s: spell name, %2$i: spell level
2576 const std::string message = string_format( _( "This item casts %1$s at level %2$i." ),
2577 item_spell->name, spell_level );
2578 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2579 if( no_fail ) {
2580 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "This item never fails." ) );
2581 }
2582}
2583
2584int cast_spell_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2585{
2586 if( need_worn && !p.is_worn( it ) ) {
2587 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
2588 return 0;
2589 }
2590 if( need_wielding && !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
2591 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." ), it.tname() );
2592 return 0;
2593 }
2594
2595 spell casting = spell( spell_id( item_spell ) );
2596 int charges = it.type->charges_to_use();
2597
2598 player_activity cast_spell( ACT_SPELLCASTING, casting.casting_time( p ) );
2599 // [0] this is used as a spell level override for items casting spells
2600 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( spell_level );
2601 if( no_fail ) {
2602 // [1] if this value is 1, the spell never fails
2603 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2604 } else {
2605 // [1]
2606 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2607 }
2608 cast_spell.name = casting.id().c_str();
2609 if( it.has_flag( "USE_PLAYER_ENERGY" ) ) {
2610 // [2] this value overrides the mana cost if set to 0
2611 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2612 charges = 0;
2613 } else {
2614 // [2]
2615 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2616 }
2617 p.assign_activity( cast_spell, false );
2618 return charges;
2619}
2620
2621std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> holster_actor::clone() const
2622{
2623 return std::make_unique<holster_actor>( *this );
2624}
2625
2626void holster_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2627{
2628 holster_prompt = obj.get_string( "holster_prompt", "" );
2629 holster_msg = obj.get_string( "holster_msg", "" );
2630 assign( obj, "max_volume", max_volume );
2631 if( !assign( obj, "min_volume", min_volume ) ) {
2632 min_volume = max_volume / 3;
2633 }
2634
2635 assign( obj, "max_weight", max_weight );
2636 multi = obj.get_int( "multi", multi );
2637 draw_cost = obj.get_int( "draw_cost", draw_cost );
2638
2639 auto tmp = obj.get_string_array( "skills" );
2640 std::transform( tmp.begin(), tmp.end(), std::back_inserter( skills ),
2641 []( const std::string & elem ) {
2642 return skill_id( elem );
2643 } );
2644
2645 flags = obj.get_string_array( "flags" );
2646}
2647
2648bool holster_actor::can_holster( const item &obj ) const
2649{
2650 if( obj.volume() > max_volume || obj.volume() < min_volume ) {
2651 return false;
2652 }
2653 if( max_weight > 0_gram && obj.weight() > max_weight ) {
2654 return false;
2655 }
2656 if( obj.active ) {
2657 return false;
2658 }
2659 return std::any_of( flags.begin(), flags.end(), [&]( const std::string & f ) {
2660 return obj.has_flag( f );
2661 } ) ||
2662 std::find( skills.begin(), skills.end(), obj.gun_skill() ) != skills.end();
2663}
2664
2665bool holster_actor::store( player &p, item &holster, item &obj ) const
2666{
2667 if( obj.is_null() || holster.is_null() ) {
2668 debugmsg( "Null item was passed to holster_actor" );
2669 return false;
2670 }
2671
2672 // if selected item is unsuitable inform the player why not
2673 if( obj.volume() > max_volume ) {
2674 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %1$s is too big to fit in your %2$s" ),
2675 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2676 return false;
2677 }
2678
2679 if( obj.volume() < min_volume ) {
2680 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %1$s is too small to fit in your %2$s" ),
2681 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2682 return false;
2683 }
2684
2685 if( max_weight > 0_gram && obj.weight() > max_weight ) {
2686 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %1$s is too heavy to fit in your %2$s" ),
2687 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2688 return false;
2689 }
2690
2691 if( obj.active ) {
2692 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't think putting your %1$s in your %2$s is a good idea" ),
2693 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2694 return false;
2695 }
2696
2697 if( std::none_of( flags.begin(), flags.end(), [&]( const std::string & f ) {
2698 return obj.has_flag( f );
2699 } ) &&
2700 std::find( skills.begin(), skills.end(), obj.gun_skill() ) == skills.end() ) {
2701 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't put your %1$s in your %2$s" ),
2702 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2703 return false;
2704 }
2705
2706 p.add_msg_if_player( holster_msg.empty() ? _( "You holster your %s" ) : _( holster_msg ),
2707 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2708
2709 // holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2710 p.store( holster, obj, false, draw_cost );
2711 return true;
2712}
2713
2714int holster_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2715{
2716 if( p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
2717 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need to unwield your %s before using it." ), it.tname() );
2718 return 0;
2719 }
2720
2721 int pos = 0;
2722 std::vector<std::string> opts;
2723
2724 if( static_cast<int>( it.contents.num_item_stacks() ) < multi ) {
2725 std::string prompt = holster_prompt.empty() ? _( "Holster item" ) : _( holster_prompt );
2726 opts.push_back( prompt );
2727 pos = -1;
2728 }
2729
2730 std::list<item *> top_contents{ it.contents.all_items_top() };
2731 std::transform( top_contents.begin(), top_contents.end(), std::back_inserter( opts ),
2732 []( const item * elem ) {
2733 return string_format( _( "Draw %s" ), elem->display_name() );
2734 } );
2735
2736 item *internal_item = nullptr;
2737 if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
2738 int ret = uilist( string_format( _( "Use %s" ), it.tname() ), opts );
2739 if( ret < 0 ) {
2740 pos = -2;
2741 } else {
2742 pos += ret;
2743 if( opts.size() != it.contents.num_item_stacks() ) {
2744 ret--;
2745 }
2746 auto iter = std::next( top_contents.begin(), ret );
2747 internal_item = *iter;
2748 }
2749 } else {
2750 internal_item = &it.contents.front();
2751 }
2752
2753 if( pos < -1 ) {
2754 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2755 return 0;
2756 }
2757
2758 if( pos >= 0 ) {
2759 // worn holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2760 if( p.is_worn( it ) ) {
2761 p.wield_contents( it, internal_item, false, draw_cost );
2762 } else {
2763 p.wield_contents( it, internal_item );
2764 }
2765
2766 } else {
2767 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::holster( p, it );
2768
2769 if( !loc ) {
2770 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2771 return 0;
2772 }
2773
2774 store( p, it, *loc.obtain( p ) );
2775 }
2776
2777 return 0;
2778}
2779
2780void holster_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2781{
2782 std::string message = vgettext( "Can be activated to store a suitable item.",
2783 "Can be activated to store suitable items.", multi );
2784 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2785 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Num items: " ), "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags, multi );
2786 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Item volume: Min: " ),
2787 string_format( "<num> %s", volume_units_abbr() ),
2788 iteminfo::is_decimal | iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2789 convert_volume( min_volume.value() ) );
2790 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( " Max: " ),
2791 string_format( "<num> %s", volume_units_abbr() ),
2792 iteminfo::is_decimal,
2793 convert_volume( max_volume.value() ) );
2794
2795 if( max_weight > 0_gram ) {
2796 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Max item weight: " ),
2797 string_format( _( "<num> %s" ), weight_units() ),
2798 iteminfo::is_decimal,
2799 convert_weight( max_weight ) );
2800 }
2801}
2802
2803units::volume holster_actor::max_stored_volume() const
2804{
2805 return max_volume * multi;
2806}
2807
2808std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> bandolier_actor::clone() const
2809{
2810 return std::make_unique<bandolier_actor>( *this );
2811}
2812
2813void bandolier_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2814{
2815 capacity = obj.get_int( "capacity", capacity );
2816 ammo.clear();
2817 for( auto &e : obj.get_tags( "ammo" ) ) {
2818 ammo.insert( ammotype( e ) );
2819 }
2820
2821 draw_cost = obj.get_int( "draw_cost", draw_cost );
2822}
2823
2824void bandolier_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2825{
2826 if( !ammo.empty() ) {
2827 auto str = enumerate_as_string( ammo.begin(), ammo.end(),
2828 [&]( const ammotype & a ) {
2829 return string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>", a->name() );
2830 }, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
2831
2832 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format(
2833 vgettext( "Can be activated to store a single round of ",
2834 "Can be activated to store up to <stat>%i</stat> rounds of ", capacity ),
2835 capacity ),
2836 str );
2837 }
2838}
2839
2840bool bandolier_actor::is_valid_ammo_type( const itype &t ) const
2841{
2842 if( !t.ammo ) {
2843 return false;
2844 }
2845 return ammo.count( t.ammo->type );
2846}
2847
2848bool bandolier_actor::can_store( const item &bandolier, const item &obj ) const
2849{
2850 if( !bandolier.contents.empty() && ( bandolier.contents.front().typeId() != obj.typeId() ||
2851 bandolier.contents.front().charges >= capacity ) ) {
2852 return false;
2853 }
2854
2855 return is_valid_ammo_type( *obj.type );
2856}
2857
2858bool bandolier_actor::reload( player &p, item &obj ) const
2859{
2860 if( !obj.is_bandolier() ) {
2861 debugmsg( "Invalid item passed to bandolier_actor" );
2862 return false;
2863 }
2864
2865 // find all nearby compatible ammo (matching type currently contained if appropriate)
2866 auto found = p.nearby( [&]( const item * e, const item * parent ) {
2867 return parent != &obj && can_store( obj, *e );
2868 } );
2869
2870 if( found.empty() ) {
2871 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "No matching ammo for the %1$s" ), obj.type_name() );
2872 return false;
2873 }
2874
2875 // convert these into reload options and display the selection prompt
2876 std::vector<item::reload_option> opts;
2877 std::transform( std::make_move_iterator( found.begin() ), std::make_move_iterator( found.end() ),
2878 std::back_inserter( opts ), [&]( item_location && e ) {
2879 return item::reload_option( &p, &obj, &obj, e );
2880 } );
2881
2882 item::reload_option sel = p.select_ammo( obj, std::move( opts ) );
2883 if( !sel ) {
2884 return false; // canceled menu
2885 }
2886
2887 p.mod_moves( -sel.moves() );
2888
2889 // add or stack the ammo dependent upon existing contents
2890 if( obj.contents.empty() ) {
2891 item put = sel.ammo->split( sel.qty() );
2892 if( !put.is_null() ) {
2893 obj.put_in( put );
2894 } else {
2895 obj.put_in( *sel.ammo );
2896 sel.ammo.remove_item();
2897 }
2898 } else {
2899 obj.contents.front().charges += sel.qty();
2900 if( sel.ammo->charges > sel.qty() ) {
2901 sel.ammo->charges -= sel.qty();
2902 } else {
2903 sel.ammo.remove_item();
2904 }
2905 }
2906
2907 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You store the %1$s in your %2$s" ),
2908 obj.contents.front().tname( sel.qty() ),
2909 obj.type_name() );
2910
2911 return true;
2912}
2913
2914int bandolier_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2915{
2916 if( p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
2917 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need to unwield your %s before using it." ),
2918 it.type_name() );
2919 return 0;
2920 }
2921
2922 uilist menu;
2923 menu.text = _( "Store ammo" );
2924
2925 std::vector<std::function<void()>> actions;
2926
2927 menu.addentry( -1, it.contents.empty() || it.contents.front().charges < capacity,
2928 'r', _( "Store ammo in %s" ), it.type_name() );
2929
2930 actions.emplace_back( [&] { reload( p, it ); } );
2931
2932 menu.addentry( -1, !it.contents.empty(), 'u', _( "Unload %s" ), it.type_name() );
2933
2934 actions.emplace_back( [&] {
2935 if( p.i_add_or_drop( it.contents.front() ) )
2936 {
2937 it.remove_item( it.contents.front() );
2938 } else
2939 {
2940 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2941 }
2942 } );
2943
2944 menu.query();
2945 if( menu.ret >= 0 ) {
2946 actions[ menu.ret ]();
2947 }
2948
2949 return 0;
2950}
2951
2952units::volume bandolier_actor::max_stored_volume() const
2953{
2954 // This is relevant only for bandoliers with the non-rigid flag
2955
2956 // Find all valid ammo
2957 auto ammo_types = item_controller->find( [&]( const itype & t ) {
2958 return is_valid_ammo_type( t );
2959 } );
2960 // Figure out which has the greatest volume and calculate on that basis
2961 units::volume max_ammo_volume{};
2962 for( const auto *ammo_type : ammo_types ) {
2963 max_ammo_volume = std::max( max_ammo_volume, ammo_type->volume / ammo_type->stack_size );
2964 }
2965 return max_ammo_volume * capacity;
2966}
2967
2968std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> ammobelt_actor::clone() const
2969{
2970 return std::make_unique<ammobelt_actor>( *this );
2971}
2972
2973void ammobelt_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2974{
2975 belt = itype_id( obj.get_string( "belt" ) );
2976}
2977
2978void ammobelt_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2979{
2980 dump.emplace_back( "AMMO", string_format( _( "Can be used to assemble: %s" ),
2981 item::nname( belt ) ) );
2982}
2983
2984int ammobelt_actor::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
2985{
2986 item mag( belt );
2987 mag.ammo_unset();
2988
2989 if( p.rate_action_reload( mag ) != hint_rating::good ) {
2990 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Insufficient ammunition to assemble %s" ), mag.tname() );
2991 return 0;
2992 }
2993
2994 item::reload_option opt = p.select_ammo( mag, true );
2995 if( opt ) {
2996 p.assign_activity( ACT_RELOAD, opt.moves(), opt.qty() );
2997 p.activity.targets.emplace_back( p, &p.i_add( mag ) );
2998 p.activity.targets.push_back( std::move( opt.ammo ) );
2999 }
3000
3001 return 0;
3002}
3003
3004void repair_item_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3005{
3006 // Mandatory:
3007 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
3008 materials.emplace( line );
3009 }
3010
3011 // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
3012 const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
3013 used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
3014 if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
3015 obj.throw_error( "Invalid skill", "skill" );
3016 }
3017
3018 cost_scaling = obj.get_float( "cost_scaling" );
3019
3020 // Optional
3021 tool_quality = obj.get_int( "tool_quality", 0 );
3022 move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost", 500 );
3023 trains_skill_to = obj.get_int( "trains_skill_to", 5 ) - 1;
3024}
3025
3026bool repair_item_actor::can_use_tool( const player &p, const item &tool, bool print_msg ) const
3027{
3028 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
3029 if( print_msg ) {
3030 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
3031 }
3032 return false;
3033 }
3034 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
3035 if( print_msg ) {
3036 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ),
3037 _( "<npcname> can't do that while mounted." ) );
3038 }
3039 return false;
3040 }
3041 if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
3042 if( print_msg ) {
3043 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't see to do that!" ) );
3044 }
3045 return false;
3046 }
3047 if( !tool.units_sufficient( p ) ) {
3048 if( print_msg ) {
3049 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your tool does not have enough charges to do that." ) );
3050 }
3051 return false;
3052 }
3053
3054 return true;
3055}
3056
3057static item_location get_item_location( player &p, item &it, const tripoint &pos )
3058{
3059 // Item on a character
3060 if( p.has_item( it ) ) {
3061 return item_location( p, &it );
3062 }
3063
3064 // Item in a vehicle
3065 if( const optional_vpart_position &vp = get_map().veh_at( pos ) ) {
3066 vehicle_cursor vc( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() );
3067 bool found_in_vehicle = false;
3068 vc.visit_items( [&]( const item * e ) {
3069 if( e == &it ) {
3070 found_in_vehicle = true;
3071 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
3072 }
3073 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3074 } );
3075 if( found_in_vehicle ) {
3076 return item_location( vc, &it );
3077 }
3078 }
3079
3080 // Item on the map
3081 return item_location( pos, &it );
3082}
3083
3084int repair_item_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint &position ) const
3085{
3086 if( !can_use_tool( p, it, true ) ) {
3087 return 0;
3088 }
3089
3090 p.assign_activity( ACT_REPAIR_ITEM, 0, p.get_item_position( &it ), INT_MIN );
3091 // We also need to store the repair actor subtype in the activity
3092 p.activity.str_values.push_back( type );
3093 // storing of item_location to support repairs by tools on the ground
3094 p.activity.targets.emplace_back( get_item_location( p, it, position ) );
3095 // All repairs are done in the activity, including charge cost and target item selection
3096 return 0;
3097}
3098
3099std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> repair_item_actor::clone() const
3100{
3101 return std::make_unique<repair_item_actor>( *this );
3102}
3103
3104bool repair_item_actor::handle_components( player &pl, const item &fix,
3105 bool print_msg, bool just_check ) const
3106{
3107 // Entries valid for repaired items
3108 std::set<material_id> valid_entries;
3109 for( const auto &mat : materials ) {
3110 if( fix.made_of( mat ) ) {
3111 valid_entries.insert( mat );
3112 }
3113 }
3114
3115 if( valid_entries.empty() ) {
3116 if( print_msg ) {
3117 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is not made of any of:" ),
3118 fix.tname() );
3119 for( const auto &mat_name : materials ) {
3120 const auto &mat = mat_name.obj();
3121 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "%s (repaired using %s)" ), mat.name(),
3122 item::nname( mat.repaired_with(), 2 ) );
3123 }
3124 }
3125
3126 return false;
3127 }
3128
3129 const inventory &crafting_inv = pl.crafting_inventory();
3130
3131 // Repairing or modifying items requires at least 1 repair item,
3132 // otherwise number is related to size of item
3133 // Round up if checking, but roll if actually consuming
3134 // TODO: should 250_ml be part of the cost_scaling?
3135 const int items_needed = std::max<int>( 1, just_check ?
3136 std::ceil( fix.volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) :
3137 roll_remainder( fix.volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) );
3138
3139 std::function<bool( const item & )> filter;
3140 if( fix.is_filthy() ) {
3141 filter = []( const item & component ) {
3142 return component.allow_crafting_component();
3143 };
3144 } else {
3145 filter = is_crafting_component;
3146 }
3147
3148 // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
3149 std::vector<item_comp> comps;
3150 for( const auto &entry : valid_entries ) {
3151 const itype_id &component_id = entry.obj().repaired_with();
3152 // Certain (different!) materials are repaired with the same components (steel, iron, hard steel use scrap metal).
3153 // This checks avoids adding the same component twice, which is annoying to the user.
3154 if( std::find_if( comps.begin(), comps.end(), [&]( const item_comp & ic ) {
3155 return ic.type == component_id;
3156 } ) != comps.end() ) {
3157 continue;
3158 }
3159 if( item::count_by_charges( component_id ) ) {
3160 if( crafting_inv.has_charges( component_id, items_needed ) ) {
3161 comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
3162 }
3163 } else if( crafting_inv.has_amount( component_id, items_needed, false, filter ) ) {
3164 comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
3165 }
3166 }
3167
3168 if( comps.empty() ) {
3169 if( print_msg ) {
3170 for( const auto &entry : valid_entries ) {
3171 const auto &mat_comp = entry.obj().repaired_with();
3172 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3173 _( "You don't have enough %s to do that. Have: %d, need: %d" ),
3174 item::nname( mat_comp, 2 ),
3175 mat_comp->count_by_charges() ?
3176 crafting_inv.amount_of( mat_comp, false ) :
3177 crafting_inv.charges_of( mat_comp, items_needed ),
3178 items_needed );
3179 }
3180 }
3181
3182 return false;
3183 }
3184
3185 if( !just_check ) {
3186 if( comps.empty() ) {
3187 // This shouldn't happen - the check in can_repair_target should prevent it
3188 // But report it, just in case
3189 debugmsg( "Attempted repair with no components" );
3190 }
3191
3192 pl.consume_items( comps, 1, filter );
3193 }
3194
3195 return true;
3196}
3197
3198// Find the difficulty of the recipes that result in id
3199// If the recipe is not known by the player, +1 to difficulty
3200// If player doesn't meet the requirements of the recipe, +1 to difficulty
3201// Returns -1 if no recipe is found
3202static int find_repair_difficulty( const player &pl, const itype_id &id, bool training )
3203{
3204 // If the recipe is not found, this will remain unchanged
3205 int min = -1;
3206 for( const auto &e : recipe_dict ) {
3207 const auto r = e.second;
3208 if( id != r.result() ) {
3209 continue;
3210 }
3211 // If this is the first time we found a recipe
3212 if( min == -1 ) {
3213 min = 5;
3214 }
3215
3216 int cur_difficulty = r.difficulty;
3217 if( !training && !pl.knows_recipe( &r ) ) {
3218 cur_difficulty++;
3219 }
3220
3221 if( !training && !pl.has_recipe_requirements( r ) ) {
3222 cur_difficulty++;
3223 }
3224
3225 min = std::min( cur_difficulty, min );
3226 }
3227
3228 return min;
3229}
3230
3231// Returns the level of the lowest level recipe that results in item of `fix`'s type
3232// Or if it has a repairs_like, the lowest level recipe that results in that.
3233// If the recipe doesn't exist, difficulty is 10
3234int repair_item_actor::repair_recipe_difficulty( const player &pl,
3235 const item &fix, bool training ) const
3236{
3237 int diff = find_repair_difficulty( pl, fix.typeId(), training );
3238
3239 // If we don't find a recipe, see if there's a repairs_like that has a recipe
3240 if( diff == -1 && !fix.type->repairs_like.is_empty() ) {
3241 diff = find_repair_difficulty( pl, fix.type->repairs_like, training );
3242 }
3243
3244 // If we still don't find a recipe, difficulty is 10
3245 if( diff == -1 ) {
3246 diff = 10;
3247 }
3248
3249 return diff;
3250}
3251
3252bool repair_item_actor::can_repair_target( player &pl, const item &fix,
3253 bool print_msg ) const
3254{
3255 // In some rare cases (indices getting scrambled after inventory overflow)
3256 // our `fix` can be a different item.
3257 if( fix.is_null() ) {
3258 if( print_msg ) {
3259 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
3260 }
3261 return false;
3262 }
3263 if( fix.is_firearm() ) {
3264 if( print_msg ) {
3265 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That requires gunsmithing tools." ) );
3266 }
3267 return false;
3268 }
3269 if( fix.count_by_charges() || fix.has_flag( "NO_REPAIR" ) ) {
3270 if( print_msg ) {
3271 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot repair this type of item." ) );
3272 }
3273 return false;
3274 }
3275
3276 if( any_of( materials.begin(), materials.end(), [&fix]( const material_id & mat ) {
3277 return mat.obj()
3278 .repaired_with() == fix.typeId();
3279 } ) ) {
3280 if( print_msg ) {
3281 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This can be used to repair other items, not itself." ) );
3282 }
3283 return false;
3284 }
3285
3286 if( !handle_components( pl, fix, print_msg, true ) ) {
3287 return false;
3288 }
3289
3290 const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( "VARSIZE" );
3291 if( can_be_refitted && !fix.has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
3292 return true;
3293 }
3294
3295 const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_encumber( pl ) != 0;
3296 const bool small = pl.get_size() == MS_TINY;
3297 const bool can_resize = small != fix.has_flag( "UNDERSIZE" );
3298 if( can_be_refitted && resizing_matters && can_resize ) {
3299 return true;
3300 }
3301
3302 if( fix.damage() > 0 ) {
3303 return true;
3304 }
3305
3306 if( fix.damage() <= fix.min_damage() ) {
3307 if( print_msg ) {
3308 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is already enhanced to its maximum potential." ),
3309 fix.tname() );
3310 }
3311 return false;
3312 }
3313
3314 if( fix.has_flag( "PRIMITIVE_RANGED_WEAPON" ) || !fix.reinforceable() ) {
3315 if( print_msg ) {
3316 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." ),
3317 fix.tname() );
3318 }
3319 return false;
3320 }
3321
3322 return true;
3323}
3324
3325std::pair<float, float> repair_item_actor::repair_chance(
3326 const player &pl, const item &fix, repair_item_actor::repair_type action_type ) const
3327{
3328 /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing repair efforts */
3329 /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS randomly improves metal repair efforts */
3330 const int skill = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
3331 const int recipe_difficulty = repair_recipe_difficulty( pl, fix );
3332 int action_difficulty = 0;
3333 switch( action_type ) {
3334 case RT_REPAIR:
3335 action_difficulty = fix.damage_level( 4 );
3336 break;
3337 case RT_REFIT:
3338 // Let's make refitting as hard as recovering an almost-wrecked item
3339 action_difficulty = fix.max_damage() / itype::damage_scale;
3340 break;
3341 case RT_REINFORCE:
3342 // Reinforcing is at least as hard as refitting
3343 action_difficulty = std::max( fix.max_damage() / itype::damage_scale, recipe_difficulty );
3344 break;
3345 case RT_PRACTICE:
3346 // Skill gain scales with recipe difficulty, so practice difficulty should too
3347 action_difficulty = recipe_difficulty;
3348 default:
3349 ;
3350 }
3351
3352 const int difficulty = recipe_difficulty + action_difficulty;
3353 // Sample numbers:
3354 // Item | Damage | Skill | Dex | Success | Failure
3355 // Hoodie | 2 | 3 | 10 | 6% | 0%
3356 // Hazmat | 1 | 10 | 10 | 8% | 0%
3357 // Hazmat | 1 | 5 | 20 | 0% | 2%
3358 // t-shirt| 4 | 1 | 5 | 2% | 3%
3359 // Duster | 2 | 5 | 5 | 10% | 0%
3360 // Duster | 2 | 2 | 10 | 4% | 1%
3361 // Duster | Refit | 2 | 10 | 0% | N/A
3362 float success_chance = ( 10 + 2 * skill - 2 * difficulty + tool_quality / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
3363 /** @EFFECT_DEX reduces the chances of damaging an item when repairing */
3364 float damage_chance = ( difficulty - skill - ( tool_quality + pl.dex_cur ) / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
3365
3366 damage_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f, damage_chance ) );
3367 success_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f - damage_chance, success_chance ) );
3368
3369 return std::make_pair( success_chance, damage_chance );
3370}
3371
3372repair_item_actor::repair_type repair_item_actor::default_action( const item &fix,
3373 int current_skill_level ) const
3374{
3375 if( fix.damage() > 0 ) {
3376 return RT_REPAIR;
3377 }
3378
3379 const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE );
3380 const bool doesnt_fit = !fix.has_flag( flag_FIT );
3381 if( doesnt_fit && can_be_refitted ) {
3382 return RT_REFIT;
3383 }
3384
3385 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3386 const bool smol = player_character.get_size() == MS_TINY;
3387
3388 const bool is_undersized = fix.has_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3389 const bool is_oversized = fix.has_flag( flag_OVERSIZE );
3390 const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_encumber( player_character ) != 0;
3391
3392 const bool too_big_while_smol = smol && !is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3393 if( too_big_while_smol && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3394 return RT_DOWNSIZING;
3395 }
3396
3397 const bool too_small_while_big = !smol && is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3398 if( too_small_while_big && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3399 return RT_UPSIZING;
3400 }
3401
3402 if( fix.damage() > fix.min_damage() ) {
3403 return RT_REINFORCE;
3404 }
3405
3406 if( current_skill_level <= trains_skill_to ) {
3407 return RT_PRACTICE;
3408 }
3409
3410 return RT_NOTHING;
3411}
3412
3413static bool damage_item( player &pl, item_location &fix )
3414{
3415 const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3416 const auto destroyed = fix->inc_damage();
3417 const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3418 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s! ( %s-> %s)" ), fix->tname( 1, false ),
3419 startdurability, resultdurability );
3420 if( destroyed ) {
3421 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" ) );
3422 if( fix.where() == item_location::type::character ) {
3423 pl.i_rem_keep_contents( pl.get_item_position( fix.get_item() ) );
3424 } else {
3425 for( const item *it : fix->contents.all_items_top() ) {
3426 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( pl, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { *it }, fix.position() );
3427 }
3428 fix.remove_item();
3429 }
3430
3431 return true;
3432 }
3433
3434 return false;
3435}
3436
3437repair_item_actor::attempt_hint repair_item_actor::repair( player &pl, item &tool,
3438 item_location &fix ) const
3439{
3440 if( !can_use_tool( pl, tool, true ) ) {
3441 return AS_CANT_USE_TOOL;
3442 }
3443 if( !can_repair_target( pl, *fix, true ) ) {
3444 return AS_CANT;
3445 }
3446
3447 const int current_skill_level = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
3448 const auto action = default_action( *fix, current_skill_level );
3449 const auto chance = repair_chance( pl, *fix, action );
3450 int practice_amount = repair_recipe_difficulty( pl, *fix, true ) / 2 + 1;
3451 float roll_value = rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
3452 enum roll_result {
3453 SUCCESS,
3454 FAILURE,
3455 NEUTRAL
3456 } roll;
3457
3458 if( roll_value > 1.0f - chance.second ) {
3459 roll = FAILURE;
3460 } else if( roll_value < chance.first ) {
3461 roll = SUCCESS;
3462 } else {
3463 roll = NEUTRAL;
3464 }
3465
3466 if( action == RT_NOTHING ) {
3467 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You won't learn anything more by doing that." ) );
3468 return AS_CANT;
3469 }
3470
3471 // If not for this if, it would spam a lot
3472 if( current_skill_level > trains_skill_to ) {
3473 practice_amount = 0;
3474 }
3475 pl.practice( used_skill, practice_amount, trains_skill_to );
3476
3477 if( roll == FAILURE ) {
3478 return damage_item( pl, fix ) ? AS_DESTROYED : AS_FAILURE;
3479 }
3480
3481 if( action == RT_PRACTICE ) {
3482 return AS_RETRY;
3483 }
3484
3485 if( action == RT_REPAIR ) {
3486 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3487 const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3488 const auto damage = fix->damage();
3489 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3490 fix->set_damage( std::max( damage - itype::damage_scale, 0 ) );
3491 const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3492 if( damage > itype::damage_scale ) {
3493 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s! ( %s-> %s)" ), fix->tname( 1, false ),
3494 startdurability, resultdurability );
3495 } else {
3496 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s completely! ( %s-> %s)" ), fix->tname( 1,
3497 false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
3498 }
3499 return AS_SUCCESS;
3500 }
3501
3502 return AS_RETRY;
3503 }
3504
3505 if( action == RT_REFIT ) {
3506 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3507 if( !fix->has_flag( "FIT" ) ) {
3508 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You take your %s in, improving the fit." ),
3509 fix->tname() );
3510 fix->set_flag( "FIT" );
3511 }
3512 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3513 return AS_SUCCESS;
3514 }
3515
3516 return AS_RETRY;
3517 }
3518
3519 if( action == RT_DOWNSIZING ) {
3520 //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because DOWNSIZING already guarantees that
3521 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3522 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You resize the %s to accommodate your tiny build." ),
3523 fix->tname().c_str() );
3524 fix->set_flag( "UNDERSIZE" );
3525 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3526 return AS_SUCCESS;
3527 }
3528 return AS_RETRY;
3529 }
3530
3531 if( action == RT_UPSIZING ) {
3532 //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because UPSIZING already guarantees that
3533 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3534 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You adjust the %s back to its normal size." ),
3535 fix->tname().c_str() );
3536 fix->unset_flag( "UNDERSIZE" );
3537 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3538 return AS_SUCCESS;
3539 }
3540 return AS_RETRY;
3541 }
3542
3543 if( action == RT_REINFORCE ) {
3544 if( fix->has_flag( "PRIMITIVE_RANGED_WEAPON" ) || !fix->reinforceable() ) {
3545 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." ),
3546 fix->tname() );
3547 return AS_CANT;
3548 }
3549
3550 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3551 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You make your %s extra sturdy." ), fix->tname() );
3552 fix->mod_damage( -itype::damage_scale );
3553 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false );
3554 return AS_SUCCESS;
3555 }
3556
3557 return AS_RETRY;
3558 }
3559
3560 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is already enhanced." ), fix->tname() );
3561 return AS_CANT;
3562}
3563
3564std::string repair_item_actor::action_description( repair_item_actor::repair_type rt )
3565{
3566 static const std::array<std::string, NUM_REPAIR_TYPES> arr = {{
3567 translate_marker( "Nothing" ),
3568 translate_marker( "Repairing" ),
3569 translate_marker( "Refitting" ),
3570 translate_marker( "Downsizing" ),
3571 translate_marker( "Upsizing" ),
3572 translate_marker( "Reinforcing" ),
3573 translate_marker( "Practicing" )
3574 }
3575 };
3576
3577 return _( arr[rt] );
3578}
3579
3580std::string repair_item_actor::get_name() const
3581{
3582 const std::string mats = enumerate_as_string( materials.begin(), materials.end(),
3583 []( const material_id & mid ) {
3584 return _( mid->name() );
3585 } );
3586 return string_format( _( "Repair %s" ), mats );
3587}
3588
3589void heal_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3590{
3591 // Mandatory
3592 move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost" );
3593 limb_power = obj.get_float( "limb_power", 0 );
3594
3595 // Optional
3596 bandages_power = obj.get_float( "bandages_power", 0 );
3597 bandages_scaling = obj.get_float( "bandages_scaling", 0.25f * bandages_power );
3598 disinfectant_power = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_power", 0 );
3599 disinfectant_scaling = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_scaling", 0.25f * disinfectant_power );
3600
3601 head_power = obj.get_float( "head_power", 0.8f * limb_power );
3602 torso_power = obj.get_float( "torso_power", 1.5f * limb_power );
3603
3604 limb_scaling = obj.get_float( "limb_scaling", 0.25f * limb_power );
3605 double scaling_ratio = limb_power < 0.0001f ? 0.0 :
3606 static_cast<double>( limb_scaling / limb_power );
3607 head_scaling = obj.get_float( "head_scaling", scaling_ratio * head_power );
3608 torso_scaling = obj.get_float( "torso_scaling", scaling_ratio * torso_power );
3609
3610 bleed = obj.get_float( "bleed", 0.0f );
3611 bite = obj.get_float( "bite", 0.0f );
3612 infect = obj.get_float( "infect", 0.0f );
3613
3614 long_action = obj.get_bool( "long_action", false );
3615
3616 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
3617 for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
3618 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
3619 }
3620 }
3621
3622 if( obj.has_string( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3623 obj.read( "used_up_item", used_up_item_id, true );
3624 } else if( obj.has_object( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3625 JsonObject u = obj.get_object( "used_up_item" );
3626 u.read( "id", used_up_item_id, true );
3627 used_up_item_quantity = u.get_int( "quantity", used_up_item_quantity );
3628 used_up_item_charges = u.get_int( "charges", used_up_item_charges );
3629 used_up_item_flags = u.get_tags( "flags" );
3630 }
3631}
3632
3633static player &get_patient( player &healer, const tripoint &pos )
3634{
3635 if( healer.pos() == pos ) {
3636 return healer;
3637 }
3638
3639 player *const person = g->critter_at<player>( pos );
3640 if( !person ) {
3641 // Default to heal self on failure not to break old functionality
3642 add_msg( m_debug, "No heal target at position %d,%d,%d", pos.x, pos.y, pos.z );
3643 return healer;
3644 }
3645
3646 return *person;
3647}
3648
3649int heal_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint &pos ) const
3650{
3651 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
3652 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
3653 return 0;
3654 }
3655 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
3656 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
3657 return 0;
3658 }
3659 if( get_option<bool>( "FILTHY_WOUNDS" ) && it.is_filthy() ) {
3660 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't use filthy items for healing." ) );
3661 return 0;
3662 }
3663
3664 player &patient = get_patient( p, pos );
3665 const hp_part hpp = use_healing_item( p, patient, it, false );
3666 if( hpp == num_hp_parts ) {
3667 return 0;
3668 }
3669
3670 int cost = move_cost;
3671 if( long_action ) {
3672 // A hack: long action healing on NPCs isn't done yet.
3673 // So just heal at start and paralyze the player for 5 minutes.
3674 cost /= std::min( 10, p.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) + 1 );
3675 }
3676
3677 // NPCs can use first aid now, but they can't perform long actions
3678 if( long_action && &patient == &p && !p.is_npc() ) {
3679 // Assign first aid long action.
3680 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID speeds up firstaid activity */
3681 p.assign_activity( ACT_FIRSTAID, cost, 0, 0, it.tname() );
3682 p.activity.targets.push_back( item_location( p, &it ) );
3683 p.activity.values.push_back( hpp );
3684 p.moves = 0;
3685 return 0;
3686 }
3687
3688 p.moves -= cost;
3689 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You use your %s." ), it.tname() );
3690 return it.type->charges_to_use();
3691}
3692
3693std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> heal_actor::clone() const
3694{
3695 return std::make_unique<heal_actor>( *this );
3696}
3697
3698int heal_actor::get_heal_value( const Character &healer, hp_part healed ) const
3699{
3700 int heal_base;
3701 float bonus_mult;
3702 if( healed == hp_head ) {
3703 heal_base = head_power;
3704 bonus_mult = head_scaling;
3705 } else if( healed == hp_torso ) {
3706 heal_base = torso_power;
3707 bonus_mult = torso_scaling;
3708 } else {
3709 heal_base = limb_power;
3710 bonus_mult = limb_scaling;
3711 }
3712
3713 if( heal_base > 0 ) {
3714 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3715 return heal_base + bonus_mult * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3716 }
3717
3718 return heal_base;
3719}
3720
3721int heal_actor::get_bandaged_level( const Character &healer ) const
3722{
3723 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3724 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3725 return bandages_power + bandages_scaling * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3726 }
3727
3728 return bandages_power;
3729}
3730
3731int heal_actor::get_disinfected_level( const Character &healer ) const
3732{
3733 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3734 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3735 return disinfectant_power + disinfectant_scaling * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3736 }
3737
3738 return disinfectant_power;
3739}
3740
3741int heal_actor::finish_using( player &healer, player &patient, item &it, hp_part healed ) const
3742{
3743 float practice_amount = limb_power * 3.0f;
3744 const int dam = get_heal_value( healer, healed );
3745
3746 const bodypart_id bp = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( healed ) ).id();
3747 const int cur_hp = patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3748
3749 if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam > 0 ) ) { // Prevent first-aid from mending limbs
3750 patient.heal( bp, dam );
3751 } else if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam < 0 ) ) {
3752 patient.apply_damage( nullptr, bp, -dam ); //hurt takes + damage
3753 }
3754
3755 const body_part bp_healed = player::hp_to_bp( healed );
3756
3757 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3758 const bool u_see = healer.is_player() || patient.is_player() ||
3759 player_character.sees( healer ) || player_character.sees( patient );
3760 const bool player_healing_player = healer.is_player() && patient.is_player();
3761 // Need a helper here - messages are from healer's point of view
3762 // but it would be cool if NPCs could use this function too
3763 const auto heal_msg = [&]( game_message_type msg_type,
3764 const char *player_player_msg, const char *other_msg ) {
3765 if( !u_see ) {
3766 return;
3767 }
3768
3769 if( player_healing_player ) {
3770 add_msg( msg_type, player_player_msg );
3771 } else {
3772 add_msg( msg_type, other_msg );
3773 }
3774 };
3775
3776 if( patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed ) ) {
3777 if( x_in_y( bleed, 1.0f ) ) {
3778 patient.remove_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed );
3779 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You stop the bleeding." ), _( "The bleeding is stopped." ) );
3780 } else {
3781 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "You fail to stop the bleeding." ), _( "The wound still bleeds." ) );
3782 }
3783
3784 practice_amount += bleed * 3.0f;
3785 }
3786 if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed ) ) {
3787 if( x_in_y( bite, 1.0f ) ) {
3788 patient.remove_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed );
3789 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You clean the wound." ), _( "The wound is cleaned." ) );
3790 } else {
3791 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still aches." ), _( "The wound still looks bad." ) );
3792 }
3793
3794 practice_amount += bite * 3.0f;
3795 }
3796 if( patient.has_effect( effect_infected, bp_healed ) ) {
3797 if( x_in_y( infect, 1.0f ) ) {
3798 const time_duration infected_dur = patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, bp_healed );
3799 patient.remove_effect( effect_infected, bp_healed );
3800 patient.add_effect( effect_recover, infected_dur );
3801 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You disinfect the wound." ), _( "The wound is disinfected." ) );
3802 } else {
3803 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still hurts." ), _( "The wound still looks nasty." ) );
3804 }
3805
3806 practice_amount += infect * 10.0f;
3807 }
3808
3809 if( long_action ) {
3810 healer.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish using the %s." ), it.tname() );
3811 }
3812
3813 for( const auto &eff : effects ) {
3814 patient.add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp );
3815 if( eff.permanent ) {
3816 patient.get_effect( eff.id, eff.bp ).set_permanent();
3817 }
3818 }
3819
3820 if( !used_up_item_id.is_empty() ) {
3821 // If the item is a tool, `make` it the new form
3822 // Otherwise it probably was consumed, so create a new one
3823 if( it.is_tool() ) {
3824 it.convert( used_up_item_id );
3825 for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3826 it.set_flag( flag );
3827 }
3828 } else {
3829 item used_up( used_up_item_id, it.birthday() );
3830 used_up.charges = used_up_item_charges;
3831 for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3832 used_up.set_flag( flag );
3833 }
3834 healer.i_add_or_drop( used_up, used_up_item_quantity );
3835 }
3836 }
3837
3838 // apply healing over time effects
3839 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3840 int bandages_intensity = get_bandaged_level( healer );
3841 patient.add_effect( effect_bandaged, 1_turns, bp_healed );
3842 effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_bandaged, bp_healed );
3843 e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * bandages_intensity );
3844 patient.damage_bandaged[healed] = patient.get_part_hp_max( bp ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3845 practice_amount += 2 * bandages_intensity;
3846 }
3847 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3848 int disinfectant_intensity = get_disinfected_level( healer );
3849 patient.add_effect( effect_disinfected, 1_turns, bp_healed );
3850 effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_disinfected, bp_healed );
3851 e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * disinfectant_intensity );
3852 patient.damage_disinfected[healed] = patient.get_part_hp_max( bp ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3853 practice_amount += 2 * disinfectant_intensity;
3854 }
3855 practice_amount = std::max( 9.0f, practice_amount );
3856
3857 healer.practice( skill_firstaid, static_cast<int>( practice_amount ) );
3858 return it.type->charges_to_use();
3859}
3860
3861static hp_part pick_part_to_heal(
3862 const player &healer, const player &patient,
3863 const std::string &menu_header,
3864 int limb_power, int head_bonus, int torso_bonus,
3865 float bleed_chance, float bite_chance, float infect_chance,
3866 bool force, float bandage_power, float disinfectant_power )
3867{
3868 const bool bleed = bleed_chance > 0.0f;
3869 const bool bite = bite_chance > 0.0f;
3870 const bool infect = infect_chance > 0.0f;
3871 const bool precise = &healer == &patient ?
3872 patient.has_trait( trait_SELFAWARE ) :
3873 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3874
3875 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3876 ( healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) * 4 + healer.per_cur >= 20 );
3877 while( true ) {
3878 hp_part healed_part = patient.body_window( menu_header, force, precise,
3879 limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3880 bleed_chance, bite_chance, infect_chance, bandage_power, disinfectant_power );
3881 if( healed_part == num_hp_parts ) {
3882 return num_hp_parts;
3883 }
3884
3885 const bodypart_id &bp = convert_bp( player::hp_to_bp( healed_part ) ).id();
3886 if( ( infect && patient.has_effect( effect_infected, bp->token ) ) ||
3887 ( bite && patient.has_effect( effect_bite, bp->token ) ) ||
3888 ( bleed && patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, bp->token ) ) ) {
3889 return healed_part;
3890 }
3891
3892 if( patient.is_limb_broken( bp ) ) {
3893 if( healed_part == hp_arm_l || healed_part == hp_arm_r ) {
3894 add_msg( m_info, _( "That arm is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." ) );
3895 } else if( healed_part == hp_leg_l || healed_part == hp_leg_r ) {
3896 add_msg( m_info, _( "That leg is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." ) );
3897 } else {
3898 add_msg( m_info, "That body part is bugged. It needs developer's attention." );
3899 }
3900
3901 continue;
3902 }
3903
3904 if( force || patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp ) < patient.get_part_hp_max( bp ) ) {
3905 return healed_part;
3906 }
3907 }
3908}
3909
3910hp_part heal_actor::use_healing_item( player &healer, player &patient, item &it, bool force ) const
3911{
3912 bodypart_id healed = bodypart_id( "num_bp" );
3913 const int head_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, hp_head );
3914 const int limb_power = get_heal_value( healer, hp_arm_l );
3915 const int torso_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, hp_torso );
3916
3917 if( !patient.can_use_heal_item( it ) ) {
3918 patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3919 _( "Your biology is not compatible with that item." ),
3920 _( "<npcname>'s biology is not compatible with that item." ) );
3921 return num_hp_parts; // canceled
3922 }
3923
3924 if( healer.is_npc() ) {
3925 // NPCs heal whatever has sustained the most damaged that they can heal but never
3926 // rebandage parts
3927 int highest_damage = 0;
3928 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : patient.get_body() ) {
3929 const bodypart &part = elem.second;
3930 int damage = 0;
3931 if( ( !patient.has_effect( effect_bandaged, elem.first->token ) && bandages_power > 0 ) ||
3932 ( !patient.has_effect( effect_disinfected, elem.first->token ) && disinfectant_power > 0 ) ) {
3933 damage += part.get_hp_max() - part.get_hp_cur();
3934 damage += bleed * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bleed, elem.first->token ) / 5_minutes;
3935 damage += bite * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bite, elem.first->token ) / 10_minutes;
3936 damage += infect * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, elem.first->token ) / 10_minutes;
3937 }
3938 if( damage > highest_damage ) {
3939 highest_damage = damage;
3940 healed = elem.first.id();
3941 }
3942 }
3943 } else if( patient.is_player() ) {
3944 // Player healing self - let player select
3945 if( healer.activity.id() != ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3946 const std::string menu_header = _( "Select a body part for: " ) + it.tname();
3947 healed = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header,
3948 limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3949 bleed, bite, infect, force,
3950 get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3951 get_disinfected_level( healer ) ) ) ).id();
3952 if( healed == bodypart_id( "num_bp" ) ) {
3953 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
3954 return num_hp_parts; // canceled
3955 }
3956 }
3957 // Brick healing if using a first aid kit for the first time.
3958 if( long_action && healer.activity.id() != ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3959 // Cancel and wait for activity completion.
3960 return Character::bp_to_hp( healed->token );
3961 } else if( healer.activity.id() == ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3962 // Completed activity, extract body part from it.
3963 healed = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( static_cast<hp_part>
3964 ( healer.activity.values[0] ) ) ).id();
3965 }
3966 } else {
3967 // Player healing NPC
3968 // TODO: Remove this hack, allow using activities on NPCs
3969 const std::string menu_header = string_format( pgettext( "healing",
3970 //~ %1$s: patient name, %2$s: healing item name
3971 "Select a body part of %1$s for %2$s:" ),
3972 patient.disp_name(), it.tname() );
3973 healed = convert_bp( Character::hp_to_bp( pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header,
3974 limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3975 bleed, bite, infect, force,
3976 get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3977 get_disinfected_level( healer ) ) ) ).id();
3978 }
3979
3980 if( healed != bodypart_id( "num_bp" ) ) {
3981 finish_using( healer, patient, it, Character::bp_to_hp( healed->token ) );
3982 }
3983
3984 return Character::bp_to_hp( healed->token );
3985}
3986
3987void heal_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
3988{
3989 if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 || bandages_power > 0 ||
3990 disinfectant_power > 0 || bleed > 0.0f || bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
3991 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "<bold>Healing effects</bold> " ) );
3992 }
3993
3994 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3995 if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 ) {
3996 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base healing: " ) );
3997 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( "Head: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, head_power );
3998 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Torso: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, torso_power );
3999 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Limbs: " ), limb_power );
4000 if( g != nullptr ) {
4001 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual healing: " ) );
4002 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( "Head: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
4003 get_heal_value( player_character, hp_head ) );
4004 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Torso: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
4005 get_heal_value( player_character, hp_torso ) );
4006 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Limbs: " ), get_heal_value( player_character, hp_arm_l ) );
4007 }
4008 }
4009
4010 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
4011 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base bandaging quality: " ),
4012 texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( bandages_power ) ) );
4013 if( g != nullptr ) {
4014 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual bandaging quality: " ),
4015 texitify_healing_power( get_bandaged_level( player_character ) ) );
4016 }
4017 }
4018
4019 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
4020 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base disinfecting quality: " ),
4021 texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( disinfectant_power ) ) );
4022 if( g != nullptr ) {
4023 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual disinfecting quality: " ),
4024 texitify_healing_power( get_disinfected_level( player_character ) ) );
4025 }
4026 }
4027
4028 if( bleed > 0.0f || bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
4029 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Chance to heal (percent): " ) );
4030 if( bleed > 0.0f ) {
4031 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Bleeding: " ),
4032 static_cast<int>( bleed * 100 ) );
4033 }
4034 if( bite > 0.0f ) {
4035 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Bite: " ),
4036 static_cast<int>( bite * 100 ) );
4037 }
4038 if( infect > 0.0f ) {
4039 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Infection: " ),
4040 static_cast<int>( infect * 100 ) );
4041 }
4042 }
4043
4044 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Moves to use: " ), move_cost );
4045}
4046
4047place_trap_actor::place_trap_actor( const std::string &type ) :
4048 iuse_actor( type ), needs_neighbor_terrain( ter_str_id::NULL_ID() ),
4049 outer_layer_trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
4050
4051place_trap_actor::data::data() : trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
4052
4053void place_trap_actor::data::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4054{
4055 assign( obj, "trap", trap );
4056 assign( obj, "done_message", done_message );
4057 assign( obj, "practice", practice );
4058 assign( obj, "moves", moves );
4059}
4060
4061void place_trap_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4062{
4063 assign( obj, "allow_underwater", allow_underwater );
4064 assign( obj, "allow_under_player", allow_under_player );
4065 assign( obj, "needs_solid_neighbor", needs_solid_neighbor );
4066 assign( obj, "needs_neighbor_terrain", needs_neighbor_terrain );
4067 assign( obj, "bury_question", bury_question );
4068 if( !bury_question.empty() ) {
4069 JsonObject buried_json = obj.get_object( "bury" );
4070 buried_data.load( buried_json );
4071 }
4072 unburied_data.load( obj );
4073 assign( obj, "outer_layer_trap", outer_layer_trap );
4074}
4075
4076std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_trap_actor::clone() const
4077{
4078 return std::make_unique<place_trap_actor>( *this );
4079}
4080
4081static bool is_solid_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const point &offset )
4082{
4083 map &here = get_map();
4084 const tripoint a = pos + offset;
4085 const tripoint b = pos - offset;
4086 return here.move_cost( a ) != 2 && here.move_cost( b ) != 2;
4087}
4088
4089static bool has_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const ter_id &terrain_id )
4090{
4091 map &here = get_map();
4092 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1, 0 ) ) {
4093 if( here.ter( t ) == terrain_id ) {
4094 return true;
4095 }
4096 }
4097 return false;
4098}
4099
4100bool place_trap_actor::is_allowed( player &p, const tripoint &pos, const std::string &name ) const
4101{
4102 if( !allow_under_player && pos == p.pos() ) {
4103 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Yeah. Place the %s at your feet. Real damn smart move." ),
4104 name );
4105 return false;
4106 }
4107 map &here = get_map();
4108 if( here.move_cost( pos ) != 2 ) {
4109 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't place a %s there." ), name );
4110 return false;
4111 }
4112 if( needs_solid_neighbor ) {
4113 if( !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south ) &&
4114 !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_north_east ) ) {
4115 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You must place the %s between two solid tiles." ), name );
4116 return false;
4117 }
4118 }
4119 if( needs_neighbor_terrain && !has_neighbor( pos, needs_neighbor_terrain ) ) {
4120 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s needs a %s adjacent to it." ), name,
4121 needs_neighbor_terrain.obj().name() );
4122 return false;
4123 }
4124 const trap &existing_trap = here.tr_at( pos );
4125 if( !existing_trap.is_null() ) {
4126 if( existing_trap.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
4127 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a trap already." ),
4128 name );
4129 } else {
4130 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You trigger a %s!" ), existing_trap.name() );
4131 existing_trap.trigger( pos, &p );
4132 }
4133 return false;
4134 }
4135 return true;
4136}
4137
4138static void place_and_add_as_known( player &p, const tripoint &pos, const trap_str_id &id )
4139{
4140 map &here = get_map();
4141 here.trap_set( pos, id );
4142 const trap &tr = here.tr_at( pos );
4143 if( !tr.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
4144 p.add_known_trap( pos, tr );
4145 }
4146}
4147
4148int place_trap_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4149{
4150 const bool could_bury = !bury_question.empty();
4151 if( !allow_underwater && p.is_underwater() ) {
4152 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
4153 return 0;
4154 }
4155 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4156 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
4157 return 0;
4158 }
4159 const cata::optional<tripoint> pos_ = choose_adjacent( string_format( _( "Place %s where?" ),
4160 it.tname() ) );
4161 if( !pos_ ) {
4162 return 0;
4163 }
4164 tripoint pos = *pos_;
4165
4166 if( !is_allowed( p, pos, it.tname() ) ) {
4167 return 0;
4168 }
4169
4170 map &here = get_map();
4171 int distance_to_trap_center = unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() +
4172 outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius() + 1;
4173 if( unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() > 0 ) {
4174 // Math correction for multi-tile traps
4175 pos.x = ( pos.x - p.posx() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p.posx();
4176 pos.y = ( pos.y - p.posy() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p.posy();
4177 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(),
4178 0 ) ) {
4179 if( !is_allowed( p, t, it.tname() ) ) {
4180 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4181 _( "That trap needs a space in %d tiles radius to be clear, centered %d tiles from you." ),
4182 outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), distance_to_trap_center );
4183 return 0;
4184 }
4185 }
4186 }
4187
4188 const bool has_shovel = p.has_quality( quality_id( "DIG" ), 3 );
4189 const bool is_diggable = here.has_flag( "DIGGABLE", pos );
4190 bool bury = false;
4191 if( could_bury && has_shovel && is_diggable ) {
4192 bury = query_yn( _( bury_question ) );
4193 }
4194 const auto &data = bury ? buried_data : unburied_data;
4195
4196 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( data.done_message ), distance_to_trap_center );
4197 p.practice( skill_id( "traps" ), data.practice );
4198 p.mod_moves( -data.moves );
4199
4200 place_and_add_as_known( p, pos, data.trap );
4201 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), 0 ) ) {
4202 if( t != pos ) {
4203 place_and_add_as_known( p, t, outer_layer_trap );
4204 }
4205 }
4206 return 1;
4207}
4208
4209void emit_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4210{
4211 assign( obj, "emits", emits );
4212 assign( obj, "scale_qty", scale_qty );
4213}
4214
4215int emit_actor::use( player &, item &it, bool, const tripoint &pos ) const
4216{
4217 map &here = get_map();
4218 const float scaling = scale_qty ? it.charges : 1;
4219 for( const auto &e : emits ) {
4220 here.emit_field( pos, e, scaling );
4221 }
4222
4223 return 1;
4224}
4225
4226std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> emit_actor::clone() const
4227{
4228 return std::make_unique<emit_actor>( *this );
4229}
4230
4231void emit_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4232{
4233 /*
4234 // TODO: This must be called after all finalization
4235 for( const auto& e : emits ) {
4236 if( !e.is_valid() ) {
4237 debugmsg( "Item %s has unknown emit source %s", my_item_type.c_str(), e.c_str() );
4238 }
4239 }
4240 */
4241
4242 if( scale_qty && !item::count_by_charges( my_item_type ) ) {
4243 debugmsg( "Item %s has emit_actor with scale_qty, but is not counted by charges",
4244 my_item_type.c_str() );
4245 scale_qty = false;
4246 }
4247}
4248
4249void saw_barrel_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4250{
4251 assign( jo, "cost", cost );
4252}
4253
4254int saw_barrel_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool t, const tripoint & ) const
4255{
4256 if( t ) {
4257 return 0;
4258 }
4259
4260 auto loc = game_menus::inv::saw_barrel( p, it );
4261
4262 if( !loc ) {
4263 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4264 return 0;
4265 }
4266
4267 item &obj = *loc.obtain( p );
4268 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You saw down the barrel of your %s." ), obj.tname() );
4269 obj.put_in( item( "barrel_small", calendar::turn ) );
4270
4271 return 0;
4272}
4273
4274ret_val<bool> saw_barrel_actor::can_use_on( const player &, const item &, const item &target ) const
4275{
4276 if( !target.is_gun() ) {
4277 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "It's not a gun." ) );
4278 }
4279
4280 if( target.type->gun->barrel_length <= 0_ml ) {
4281 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is too short." ) );
4282 }
4283
4284 if( target.gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
4285 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is already sawn-off." ) );
4286 }
4287
4288 const auto gunmods = target.gunmods();
4289 const bool modified_barrel = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
4290 []( const item * mod ) {
4291 return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "barrel" );
4292 } );
4293
4294 if( modified_barrel ) {
4295 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Can't saw off modified barrels." ) );
4296 }
4297
4298 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
4299}
4300
4301std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> saw_barrel_actor::clone() const
4302{
4303 return std::make_unique<saw_barrel_actor>( *this );
4304}
4305
4306int install_bionic_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4307{
4308 if( p.can_install_bionics( *it.type, p, false ) ) {
4309 return p.install_bionics( *it.type, p, false ) ? it.type->charges_to_use() : 0;
4310 } else {
4311 return 0;
4312 }
4313}
4314
4315ret_val<bool> install_bionic_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
4316 const tripoint & ) const
4317{
4318 if( !it.is_bionic() ) {
4319 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure();
4320 }
4321 const bionic_id &bid = it.type->bionic->id;
4322 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4323 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't install bionics while mounted." ) );
4324 }
4325 if( !get_option<bool>( "MANUAL_BIONIC_INSTALLATION" ) &&
4326 !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
4327 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't self-install bionics." ) );
4328 } else if( !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
4329 if( it.has_flag( "FILTHY" ) ) {
4330 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You can't install a filthy CBM!" ) );
4331 } else if( it.has_flag( "NO_STERILE" ) ) {
4332 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "This CBM is not sterile, you can't install it." ) );
4333 } else if( it.has_fault( fault_bionic_salvaged ) ) {
4334 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure(
4335 _( "This CBM is already deployed. You need to reset it to factory state." ) );
4336 } else if( units::energy_max - p.get_max_power_level() < bid->capacity ) {
4337 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Max power capacity already reached" ) );
4338 }
4339 }
4340
4341 if( p.has_bionic( bid ) ) {
4342 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You have already installed this bionic." ) );
4343 } else if( bid->upgraded_bionic && !p.has_bionic( bid->upgraded_bionic ) ) {
4344 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "There is nothing to upgrade." ) );
4345 } else {
4346 const bool downgrade = std::any_of( bid->available_upgrades.begin(), bid->available_upgrades.end(),
4347 std::bind( &player::has_bionic, &p, std::placeholders::_1 ) );
4348
4349 if( downgrade ) {
4350 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You have a superior version installed." ) );
4351 }
4352 }
4353
4354 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
4355}
4356
4357std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> install_bionic_actor::clone() const
4358{
4359 return std::make_unique<install_bionic_actor>( *this );
4360}
4361
4362void install_bionic_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4363{
4364 if( !my_item_type->bionic ) {
4365 debugmsg( "Item %s has install_bionic actor, but it's not a bionic.", my_item_type.c_str() );
4366 }
4367}
4368
4369int detach_gunmods_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4370{
4371 auto mods = it.gunmods();
4372
4373 mods.erase( std::remove_if( mods.begin(), mods.end(), std::bind( &item::is_irremovable,
4374 std::placeholders::_1 ) ), mods.end() );
4375
4376 uilist prompt;
4377 prompt.text = _( "Remove which modification?" );
4378
4379 for( size_t i = 0; i != mods.size(); ++i ) {
4380 prompt.addentry( i, true, -1, mods[ i ]->tname() );
4381 }
4382
4383 prompt.query();
4384
4385 if( prompt.ret >= 0 ) {
4386 item *gm = mods[ prompt.ret ];
4387 p.gunmod_remove( it, *gm );
4388 } else {
4389 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4390 }
4391
4392 return 0;
4393}
4394
4395ret_val<bool> detach_gunmods_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it, bool,
4396 const tripoint & ) const
4397{
4398 const auto mods = it.gunmods();
4399
4400 if( mods.empty() ) {
4401 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Doesn't appear to be modded." ) );
4402 }
4403
4404 const bool no_removables = std::all_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(), std::bind( &item::is_irremovable,
4405 std::placeholders::_1 ) );
4406
4407 if( no_removables ) {
4408 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "None of the mods can be removed." ) );
4409 }
4410
4411 if( p.is_worn(
4412 it ) ) { // Prevent removal of shoulder straps and thereby making the gun un-wearable again.
4413 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Has to be taken off first." ) );
4414 }
4415
4416 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
4417}
4418
4419std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> detach_gunmods_actor::detach_gunmods_actor::clone() const
4420{
4421 return std::make_unique<detach_gunmods_actor>( *this );
4422}
4423
4424void detach_gunmods_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4425{
4426 if( !my_item_type->gun ) {
4427 debugmsg( "Item %s has detach_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun.", my_item_type.c_str() );
4428 }
4429}
4430
4431std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> mutagen_actor::clone() const
4432{
4433 return std::make_unique<mutagen_actor>( *this );
4434}
4435
4436void mutagen_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4437{
4438 mutation_category = obj.get_string( "mutation_category", "ANY" );
4439 is_weak = obj.get_bool( "is_weak", false );
4440 is_strong = obj.get_bool( "is_strong", false );
4441}
4442
4443int mutagen_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4444{
4445 mutagen_attempt checks =
4446 mutagen_common_checks( p, it, false, mutagen_technique::consumed_mutagen );
4447
4448 if( !checks.allowed ) {
4449 return checks.charges_used;
4450 }
4451
4452 bool no_category = mutation_category == "ANY";
4453 bool balanced = get_option<bool>( "BALANCED_MUTATIONS" );
4454 int accumulated_mutagen = p.get_effect_int( effect_accumulated_mutagen );
4455 if( balanced && !is_strong && is_weak && accumulated_mutagen < 2 && no_category && !p.query_yn(
4456 _( "Looking at it just makes you tired. It probably won't work. Do you want to try anyway?" )
4457 ) ) {
4458 return 0;
4459 }
4460 if( is_weak && !one_in( 3 ) && !balanced ) {
4461 // Nothing! Mutagenic flesh often just fails to work.
4462 return it.type->charges_to_use();
4463 }
4464
4465 if( balanced && no_category ) {
4466 for( int i = ( is_strong ? 1 : 0 ) + ( is_weak ? 0 : 1 ); i > 0; i-- ) {
4467 p.add_effect( effect_accumulated_mutagen, 2_days, num_bp );
4468 }
4469 }
4470 const mutation_category_trait &m_category = mutation_category_trait::get_category(
4471 mutation_category );
4472
4473 if( p.has_trait( trait_MUT_JUNKIE ) ) {
4474 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You quiver with anticipation…" ) );
4475 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN, 5, 50 );
4476 }
4477
4478 p.add_msg_if_player( m_category.mutagen_message() );
4479
4480 if( one_in( 6 ) ) {
4481 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
4482 _( "You suddenly feel dizzy, and collapse to the ground." ),
4483 _( "<npcname> suddenly collapses to the ground!" ) );
4484 p.add_effect( effect_downed, 20_turns, num_bp, 0 );
4485 }
4486
4487 int mut_count = 1 + ( is_strong ? one_in( 3 ) : 0 );
4488
4489 for( int i = 0; i < mut_count; i++ ) {
4490 p.mutate_category( m_category.id );
4491 p.mod_pain( m_category.mutagen_pain * rng( 1, 5 ) );
4492 }
4493 // burn calories directly
4494 p.mod_stored_nutr( m_category.mutagen_hunger * mut_count );
4495 p.mod_thirst( m_category.mutagen_thirst * mut_count );
4496 p.mod_fatigue( m_category.mutagen_fatigue * mut_count );
4497
4498 return it.type->charges_to_use();
4499}
4500
4501std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> mutagen_iv_actor::clone() const
4502{
4503 return std::make_unique<mutagen_iv_actor>( *this );
4504}
4505
4506void mutagen_iv_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4507{
4508 mutation_category = obj.get_string( "mutation_category", "ANY" );
4509}
4510
4511int mutagen_iv_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4512{
4513 mutagen_attempt checks =
4514 mutagen_common_checks( p, it, false, mutagen_technique::injected_mutagen );
4515
4516 if( !checks.allowed ) {
4517 return checks.charges_used;
4518 }
4519
4520 const mutation_category_trait &m_category = mutation_category_trait::get_category(
4521 mutation_category );
4522
4523 if( p.has_trait( trait_MUT_JUNKIE ) ) {
4524 p.add_msg_if_player( m_category.junkie_message() );
4525 } else {
4526 p.add_msg_if_player( m_category.iv_message() );
4527 }
4528
4529 // try to cross the threshold to be able to get post-threshold mutations this iv.
4530 test_crossing_threshold( p, m_category );
4531
4532 // TODO: Remove the "is_player" part, implement NPC screams
4533 if( p.is_player() && !( p.has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) && m_category.iv_sound ) {
4534 p.mod_pain( m_category.iv_pain );
4535 /** @EFFECT_STR increases volume of painful shouting when using IV mutagen */
4536 sounds::sound( p.pos(), m_category.iv_noise + p.str_cur, sounds::sound_t::alert,
4537 m_category.iv_sound_message(), true, m_category.iv_sound_id(), m_category.iv_sound_variant() );
4538 }
4539
4540 int mut_count = m_category.iv_min_mutations;
4541 for( int i = 0; i < m_category.iv_additional_mutations; ++i ) {
4542 if( !one_in( m_category.iv_additional_mutations_chance ) ) {
4543 ++mut_count;
4544 }
4545 }
4546
4547 for( int i = 0; i < mut_count; i++ ) {
4548 p.mutate_category( m_category.id );
4549 p.mod_pain( m_category.iv_pain * rng( 1, 5 ) );
4550 }
4551
4552 p.mod_stored_kcal( -10 * m_category.iv_hunger * mut_count );
4553 p.mod_thirst( m_category.iv_thirst * mut_count );
4554 p.mod_fatigue( m_category.iv_fatigue * mut_count );
4555
4556 if( m_category.id == "CHIMERA" ) {
4557 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN_CHIMERA, m_category.iv_morale, m_category.iv_morale_max );
4558 } else if( m_category.id == "ELFA" ) {
4559 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN_ELF, m_category.iv_morale, m_category.iv_morale_max );
4560 } else if( m_category.iv_morale > 0 ) {
4561 p.add_morale( MORALE_MUTAGEN_MUTATION, m_category.iv_morale, m_category.iv_morale_max );
4562 }
4563
4564 if( m_category.iv_sleep && !one_in( 3 ) ) {
4565 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, m_category.iv_sleep_message() );
4566 /** @EFFECT_INT reduces sleep duration when using IV mutagen */
4567 p.fall_asleep( time_duration::from_turns( m_category.iv_sleep_dur - p.int_cur * 5 ) );
4568 }
4569
4570 // try crossing again after getting new in-category mutations.
4571 test_crossing_threshold( p, m_category );
4572
4573 return it.type->charges_to_use();
4574}
4575
4576std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_tent_actor::clone() const
4577{
4578 return std::make_unique<deploy_tent_actor>( *this );
4579}
4580
4581void deploy_tent_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4582{
4583 assign( obj, "radius", radius );
4584 assign( obj, "wall", wall );
4585 assign( obj, "floor", floor );
4586 assign( obj, "floor_center", floor_center );
4587 assign( obj, "door_opened", door_opened );
4588 assign( obj, "door_closed", door_closed );
4589 assign( obj, "broken_type", broken_type );
4590}
4591
4592int deploy_tent_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4593{
4594 int diam = 2 * radius + 1;
4595 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4596 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
4597 return 0;
4598 }
4599 const cata::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction( string_format(
4600 _( "Put up the %s where (%dx%d clear area)?" ), it.tname(), diam, diam ) );
4601 if( !dir ) {
4602 return 0;
4603 }
4604 const tripoint direction = *dir;
4605
4606 map &here = get_map();
4607 // We place the center of the structure (radius + 1)
4608 // spaces away from the player.
4609 // First check there's enough room.
4610 const tripoint center = p.pos() + tripoint( ( radius + 1 ) * direction.x,
4611 ( radius + 1 ) * direction.y, 0 );
4612 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
4613 if( const auto vp = here.veh_at( dest ) ) {
4614 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." ), vp->vehicle().name );
4615 return 0;
4616 }
4617 if( const Creature *const c = g->critter_at( dest ) ) {
4618 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." ), c->disp_name() );
4619 return 0;
4620 }
4621 if( here.impassable( dest ) || !here.has_flag( "FLAT", dest ) ) {
4622 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s in that direction isn't suitable for placing the %s." ),
4623 here.name( dest ), it.tname() );
4624 return 0;
4625 }
4626 if( here.has_furn( dest ) ) {
4627 add_msg( m_info, _( "There is already furniture (%s) there." ), here.furnname( dest ) );
4628 return 0;
4629 }
4630 }
4631 // Make a square of floor surrounded by wall.
4632 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
4633 here.furn_set( dest, wall );
4634 }
4635 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius - 1 ) ) {
4636 here.furn_set( dest, floor );
4637 }
4638 // Place the center floor and the door.
4639 if( floor_center ) {
4640 here.furn_set( center, *floor_center );
4641 }
4642 here.furn_set( p.pos() + direction, door_closed );
4643 add_msg( m_info, _( "You set up the %s on the ground." ), it.tname() );
4644 add_msg( m_info, _( "Examine the center square to pack it up again." ) );
4645 return 1;
4646}
4647
4648bool deploy_tent_actor::check_intact( const tripoint &center ) const
4649{
4650 map &here = get_map();
4651 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
4652 const furn_id fid = here.furn( dest );
4653 if( dest == center && floor_center ) {
4654 if( fid != *floor_center ) {
4655 return false;
4656 }
4657 } else if( square_dist( dest, center ) < radius ) {
4658 // So we are inside the tent
4659 if( fid != floor ) {
4660 return false;
4661 }
4662 } else {
4663 // We are on the border of the tent
4664 if( fid != wall && fid != door_opened && fid != door_closed ) {
4665 return false;
4666 }
4667 }
4668 }
4669 return true;
4670}
4671
4672void weigh_self_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
4673{
4674 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4675 _( "Use this item to weigh yourself. Includes everything you are wearing." ) );
4676}
4677
4678int weigh_self_actor::use( player &p, item &, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4679{
4680 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4681 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot weigh yourself while mounted." ) );
4682 return 0;
4683 }
4684 // this is a weight, either in kgs or in lbs.
4685 double weight = convert_weight( p.get_weight() );
4686 if( weight > convert_weight( max_weight ) ) {
4687 popup( _( "ERROR: Max weight of %.0f %s exceeded" ), convert_weight( max_weight ), weight_units() );
4688 } else {
4689 popup( "%.0f %s", weight, weight_units() );
4690 }
4691 return 0;
4692}
4693
4694void weigh_self_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4695{
4696 assign( jo, "max_weight", max_weight );
4697}
4698
4699std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> weigh_self_actor::clone() const
4700{
4701 return std::make_unique<weigh_self_actor>( *this );
4702}
4703
4704void sew_advanced_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4705{
4706 // Mandatory:
4707 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
4708 materials.emplace( line );
4709 }
4710 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "clothing_mods" ) ) {
4711 clothing_mods.push_back( clothing_mod_id( line ) );
4712 }
4713
4714 // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
4715 const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
4716 used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
4717 if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
4718 obj.throw_error( "Invalid skill", "skill" );
4719 }
4720}
4721
4722int sew_advanced_actor::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4723{
4724 if( p.is_npc() ) {
4725 return 0;
4726 }
4727 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4728 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot do that while mounted." ) );
4729 return 0;
4730 }
4731 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
4732 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
4733 return 0;
4734 }
4735
4736 if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
4737 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't see to sew!" ) );
4738 return 0;
4739 }
4740
4741 auto filter = [this]( const item & itm ) {
4742 return itm.is_armor() && !itm.is_firearm() && !itm.is_power_armor() &&
4743 itm.made_of_any( materials );
4744 };
4745 // note: if !p.is_npc() then p is avatar.
4746 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu(
4747 filter, *p.as_avatar(), _( "Enhance which clothing?" ) );
4748 if( !loc ) {
4749 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" ) );
4750 return 0;
4751 }
4752 item &mod = *loc;
4753 if( &mod == &it ) {
4754 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4755 _( "This can be used to repair or modify other items, not itself." ) );
4756 return 0;
4757 }
4758
4759 // Gives us an item with the mod added or removed (toggled)
4760 const auto modded_copy = []( const item & proto, const std::string & mod_type ) {
4761 item mcopy = proto;
4762 if( mcopy.has_own_flag( mod_type ) == 0 ) {
4763 mcopy.set_flag( mod_type );
4764 } else {
4765 mcopy.unset_flag( mod_type );
4766 }
4767
4768 return mcopy;
4769 };
4770
4771 // Cache available materials
4772 std::map< itype_id, bool > has_enough;
4773 const int items_needed = mod.volume() / 750_ml + 1;
4774 const inventory &crafting_inv = p.crafting_inventory();
4775 // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
4776 for( auto &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
4777 has_enough[cm.item_string] = crafting_inv.has_amount( cm.item_string, items_needed );
4778 }
4779
4780 int mod_count = 0;
4781 for( auto &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
4782 mod_count += mod.has_own_flag( cm.flag );
4783 }
4784
4785 // We need extra thread to lose it on bad rolls
4786 const int thread_needed = mod.volume() / 125_ml + 10;
4787
4788 std::vector<std::string> valid_mods;
4789 if( mod.find_armor_data() ) {
4790 valid_mods = mod.find_armor_data()->valid_mods;
4791 }
4792
