4793 const auto get_compare_color = [&]( const int before, const int after,
4794 const bool higher_is_better ) {
4795 return before == after ? c_unset : ( ( after > before ) == higher_is_better ? c_light_green :
4796 c_red );
4797 };
4798 const auto get_volume_compare_color = [&]( const units::volume & before,
4799 const units::volume & after,
4800 const bool higher_is_better ) {
4801 return before == after ? c_unset : ( ( after > before ) == higher_is_better ? c_light_green :
4802 c_red );
4803 };
4804 const auto format_desc_string = [&]( const std::string & label, const int before, const int after,
4805 const bool higher_is_better ) {
4806 return colorize( string_format( "%s: %d->%d\n", label, before, after ), get_compare_color( before,
4807 after, higher_is_better ) );
4808 };
4809
4810 uilist tmenu;
4811 tmenu.text = _( "How do you want to modify it?" );
4812
4813 int index = 0;
4814 for( auto cm : clothing_mods ) {
4815 auto obj = cm.obj();
4816 item temp_item = modded_copy( mod, obj.flag );
4817 temp_item.update_clothing_mod_val();
4818
4819 bool enab = false;
4820 std::string prompt;
4821 if( mod.has_own_flag( obj.flag ) == 0 ) {
4822 // TODO: Fix for UTF-8 strings
4823 // TODO: find other places where this is used and make a global function for all
4824 static const auto tolower = []( std::string t ) {
4825 if( !t.empty() ) {
4826 t.front() = std::tolower( t.front() );
4827 }
4828 return t;
4829 };
4830 // Mod not already present, check if modification is possible
4831 if( obj.restricted &&
4832 std::find( valid_mods.begin(), valid_mods.end(), obj.flag ) == valid_mods.end() ) {
4833 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$s: mod name
4834 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (incompatible with %2$s)" ), tolower( obj.implement_prompt ),
4835 mod.tname( 1, false ) );
4836 } else if( it.charges < thread_needed ) {
4837 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of thread needed
4838 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d thread loaded)" ),
4839 tolower( obj.implement_prompt ), thread_needed );
4840 } else if( !has_enough[obj.item_string] ) {
4841 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed
4842 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d %3$s)" ), tolower( obj.implement_prompt ),
4843 items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ) );
4844 } else {
4845 // Modification is possible
4846 enab = true;
4847 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed, %4$s: number of thread needed
4848 prompt = string_format( _( "%1$s (%2$d %3$s and %4$d thread)" ), tolower( obj.implement_prompt ),
4849 items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ), thread_needed );
4850 }
4851
4852 } else {
4853 // Mod already present, give option to destroy
4854 enab = true;
4855 prompt = _( obj.destroy_prompt );
4856 }
4857 std::string desc;
4858 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Bash" ), mod.bash_resist(), temp_item.bash_resist(), true );
4859 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Cut" ), mod.cut_resist(), temp_item.cut_resist(), true );
4860 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Ballistic" ), mod.bullet_resist(), temp_item.bullet_resist(),
4861 true );
4862 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Acid" ), mod.acid_resist(), temp_item.acid_resist(), true );
4863 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Fire" ), mod.fire_resist(), temp_item.fire_resist(), true );
4864 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Warmth" ), mod.get_warmth(), temp_item.get_warmth(), true );
4865 desc += format_desc_string( _( "Encumbrance" ), mod.get_encumber( p ), temp_item.get_encumber( p ),
4866 false );
4867 auto before = mod.get_storage();
4868 auto after = temp_item.get_storage();
4869 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %s %s->%s %s\n", _( "Storage" ),
4870 format_volume( before ), volume_units_abbr(), format_volume( after ),
4871 volume_units_abbr() ), get_volume_compare_color( before, after, true ) );
4872
4873 tmenu.addentry_desc( index++, enab, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, prompt, desc );
4874 }
4875 tmenu.textwidth = 80;
4876 tmenu.desc_enabled = true;
4877 tmenu.query();
4878 const int choice = tmenu.ret;
4879
4880 if( choice < 0 || choice >= static_cast<int>( clothing_mods.size() ) ) {
4881 return 0;
4882 }
4883
4884 // The mod player picked
4885 const std::string &the_mod = clothing_mods[choice].obj().flag;
4886
4887 // If the picked mod already exists, player wants to destroy it
4888 if( mod.has_own_flag( the_mod ) ) {
4889 if( query_yn( _( "Are you sure? You will not gain any materials back." ) ) ) {
4890 mod.unset_flag( the_mod );
4891 }
4892 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
4893
4894 return 0;
4895 }
4896
4897 // Get the id of the material used
4898 const auto &repair_item = clothing_mods[choice].obj().item_string;
4899
4900 std::vector<item_comp> comps;
4901 comps.push_back( item_comp( repair_item, items_needed ) );
4902 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 30_seconds * p.fine_detail_vision_mod() );
4903 p.practice( used_skill, items_needed * 3 + 3 );
4904 /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
4905 int rn = dice( 3, 2 + p.get_skill_level( used_skill ) ); // Skill
4906 /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
4907 rn += rng( 0, p.dex_cur / 2 ); // Dexterity
4908 /** @EFFECT_PER randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
4909 rn += rng( 0, p.per_cur / 2 ); // Perception
4910 rn -= mod_count * 10; // Other mods
4911
4912 if( rn <= 8 ) {
4913 const std::string startdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
4914 const auto destroyed = mod.inc_damage();
4915 const std::string resultdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
4916 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s trying to modify it! ( %s-> %s)" ),
4917 mod.tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
4918 if( destroyed ) {
4919 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" ) );
4920 p.i_rem_keep_contents( p.get_item_position( &mod ) );
4921 }
4922 return thread_needed / 2;
4923 } else if( rn <= 10 ) {
4924 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
4925 _( "You fail to modify the clothing, and you waste thread and materials." ) );
4926 p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
4927 return thread_needed;
4928 } else if( rn <= 14 ) {
4929 p.add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, _( "You modify your %s, but waste a lot of thread." ),
4930 mod.tname() );
4931 p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
4932 mod.set_flag( the_mod );
4933 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
4934 return thread_needed;
4935 }
4936
4937 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You modify your %s!" ), mod.tname() );
4938 mod.set_flag( the_mod );
4939 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
4940 p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
4941 return thread_needed / 2;
4942}
4943
4944std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> sew_advanced_actor::clone() const
4945{
4946 return std::make_unique<sew_advanced_actor>( *this );
4947}
4948
4949void change_scent_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
4950{
4951 scenttypeid = scenttype_id( obj.get_string( "scent_typeid" ) );
4952 if( !scenttypeid.is_valid() ) {
4953 obj.throw_error( "Invalid scent type id.", "scent_typeid" );
4954 }
4955 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
4956 for( JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
4957 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
4958 }
4959 }
4960 assign( obj, "moves", moves );
4961 assign( obj, "charges_to_use", charges_to_use );
4962 assign( obj, "scent_mod", scent_mod );
4963 assign( obj, "duration", duration );
4964 assign( obj, "waterproof", waterproof );
4965}
4966
4967int change_scent_iuse::use( player &p, item &it, bool, const tripoint & ) const
4968{
4969 p.set_value( "prev_scent", p.get_type_of_scent().c_str() );
4970 if( waterproof ) {
4971 p.set_value( "waterproof_scent", "true" );
4972 }
4973 p.add_effect( efftype_id( "masked_scent" ), duration, num_bp, scent_mod );
4974 p.set_type_of_scent( scenttypeid );
4975 p.mod_moves( -moves );
4976 add_msg( m_info, _( "You use the %s to mask your scent" ), it.tname() );
4977
4978 // Apply the various effects.
4979 for( const auto &eff : effects ) {
4980 p.add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp );
4981 if( eff.permanent ) {
4982 p.get_effect( eff.id, eff.bp ).set_permanent();
4983 }
4984 }
4985 return charges_to_use;
4986}
4987
4988std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> change_scent_iuse::clone() const
4989{
4990 return std::make_unique<change_scent_iuse>( *this );
4991}

Character::assign_activity
void assign_activity(const activity_id &type, int moves=calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG, int index=-1, int pos=INT_MIN, const std::string &name="")
Legacy activity assignment, does not work for any activites using the new activity_actor class and ma...
Definition: character.cpp:9165
Character::get_skill_level
int get_skill_level(const skill_id &ident) const

Character::damage_disinfected
std::array< int, num_hp_parts > damage_disinfected
Definition: character.h:1572
Creature
Definition: creature.h:78
Creature::set_value
void set_value(const std::string &key, const std::string &value)
Definition: creature.cpp:1325
Creature::get_effect_dur
time_duration get_effect_dur(const efftype_id &eff_id, body_part bp=num_bp) const
Returns the duration of the matching effect.
Definition: creature.cpp:1235
Creature::bleed
virtual void bleed() const
Adds an appropriate blood splatter.
Definition: creature.cpp:131
Creature::is_underwater
virtual bool is_underwater() const
Definition: creature.cpp:174
Creature::add_effect
